title: Great, tasty, affordable comfort food
text:
Delighted to find a Zanzibari restaurant om the road from Muscat to Salalah.

Especially when I find that they have Ugali, which is very similar to sadza or mieliepap, that I know from Sub-Saharan Africa.

The waiter that served me could speak English, which saved me from subjecting him to my broken Arabic, and was helpful at pointing out which dishes were vegetable only, and also highlighting which had no ghee (I'm vegan).

I ordered the Ugali with beans and salad. It was delicious comfort food.

I couldn't give them 5, only because he also brought out king fish curry on the tray, which I couldn't eat as a vegan. I recognise he only did this, because he was proud of it, and I wasn't billed for it, so I'm hovering between a 4 and a 5, because the rest of the meal was delicious and exactly what I wanted and needed. In the end, I think of the other restaurants I rated a 5, which were truly exceptional, so I think this one earns a well-deserved 4, for what it is ... A cheap, friendly restaurant and takeaway, with good, comfort food from Africa, Zanzibar and the Gulf.

title: Low quality in 5 stars hotel
text:
Food less than expectations ..
Some employees are the worst i ever seen in my life like Jeoy .. who is not able to speak politly or even do the minimum requirement ... we requested a small thing .. after he refused i told him that i will checkout because of this silly attitude... he surprised me by telling " its up to you its not my issue" the most rude answer i heared from a hotel employee ... some waiters also can't smile in front of us ... 

Some employees trying to recover this horiple restorant like shef Kareem ..  he made some good dishes after we asked him and represented them with his great smile .and Umakanta was polite and welcoming person.

Over all this restorant is in a mess and i couldn't understand their standards of low hospitality and low quality of food compared with any restorant.

Me and My wife are very annoyed because of bad behavior of most of the employees who do not have enough experience and knowledge to work in 5 stars hotel .. if we can call it 5 stars!!!!!!!!!!!

title: Fantastic
text: The Souq restaurant became a part and parcel of our stay at Crowne Plaza Duqm. Owing to the Covid pandemic we decided to stay in and have our lunches and dinner at Souq. We are glad we opted for this option as we were treated to some amazing hospitality and even wonderful food. The staff need to pay their backs for going the extra mile to wow us and everyone was so down to earth and friendly with a smile welcoming you every single time we walked in. The Souq serves some tantalising breakfast buffet style as well as dinner. We look forward to our next visit whenever possible

title: Amazing Food
text: If you are in Duqm, please stop by the Crown and expierience their restaurant. their buffets are huge and very well priced. In addition, the quality is supirior!

title: The Most Delicious Foods In Duqm
text: The buffet was great as usual. I enjoyed being here while my stay and the food variety was quite satisfying as well.

title: Prawns to die for
text:
In a world swamped in a quagmire of overpriced burgers that do not deliver the needs of a man craving a meat sandwich. 
911 stands above. 
Great burgers. Large portions. Reasonable price. What else do you need?

Would recommend.

title: Great burgers
text: I have to agree with the other reviews for this place. The food is good quality, tasty and cheap. We had ‚Äúclassic‚Äù burgers with fries plus lemon mojitos and it was all great. They do a lot of take away trade but have 4 small tables for those who want to dine in and the internal environment is nicely themed and well finished. There aren‚Äôt many dining options in Duqm but this one is a winner.

title: Customer Service is a most...

title: The best burger in Duqm
text:
If you find yourself in Duqm, all is not completely lost. 

This unassuming little burger joint does completely fabulous, well cooked and very tasty burgers.

There are wide varieties of Fries (I recommend the Dynamite fries, they're a meal in themselves.

The Mojitos are good too. Very refreshing.

If you haven't been, it must easily be in the Top Five fast food joints in Oman.

title: Summer staycation
text: Wonderful, tasty food . The people are very kind and helpful. Loved the music and the ambiance. Overall, we enjoyed it well.

text: This restaurant caters for everyone from breakfast through to dinner and has quite a varied menu.  The meals are good but quite expensive like everything else at this resort. The staff are friendly & helpful and the views are amazing.

text: Amazing view, delicious food, excellent service... Thanks to Turkish Executive Chef, all the food we had was amazingly delicious

title: Delicious and lovely
text: Certainly a big "yes". We had a private group lunch (as a part of an incentive trip experience) at Al Maisan Restaurant. The experience was rather ravishing - delicious, fresh and skillfuly cooked food (grilled lobsters and beef steaks, scallops, chilled oysters, sashimi and I could carry on with basically every dish you may crave) was presented there at the same time, and each one of them was perfect. I believe it takes a grand work to keep it this way. Not to mention the smooth and attentive service, which would flawlessly wrap a caring comfort around the guests. Without reservation I recommend such a delightful dining and would love to thank the chef, Okan Demir and his entire team.

title: very good.
text: There is a person there named Sandeep. He is a smooth and easy-going person. I enjoyed eating at the restaurant and the service is excellent.

title: Wonderful restaurant
text:
The food was wonderful and my family loved it and all the servers are to wonderful  either and phyu was the best servers 
 ...

title: Food to die for!
text:
Ate in this restaurant tonight. Had the chicken kebab shawarma, followed by the Um Ali with nuts. Both were absolutely delicious and so very reasonable. Complimentary tea was also good. 
Definitely worth a visit if in Al Hamra.

title: Not good exprience
text:
We order shawrma plate worth one rial 2 plates

Not good quality looks like someone cancel order and they served us cold and not good we told that person who served us he. Goto kitchen he bring same plate again

title: Tourist restaurant
text: We stopped at this tourist restaurant for lunch as part of our tour of Nizwa. We were able to order our own choice, so ordered a mixed meat and rice, but when offered seafood soup we all said yes to that as well.  The seafood soup almost failed to have a single piece of seafood in it and really just tasted like vegetable soup so I left mine. The meat and rice was fine and we had lots of water which was a good thing followed by a thimbleful of hot sweet traditional tea.

title: Super lunch
text: A delicious meal! There is no great choice but the food is tasty and original. We had a broth, mutton (amazingly tender) with rice, skewers of dromedary and scrumptious crepes with cheese and honey. And a complimentary cup of tea with spices (mulled wine without alcohol). Highly recommended

title: Good experience
text:
Went here two consecutive days, were given complimentary starters - soup and salad

We were offeree local off-the-menu dish, which is very tasteful. Staff friendly. Place is super clean

title: Nice snacks
text: Good and crispy snacks with tea / coffee make the evening wonderful. It available in the decent price, no hesitate to visit again.

title: Plenty of choice
text:
A great place for weary travelers, this restaurant offers a vast variety of food, an impressive amount I will say! From sandwiches to curry, wraps to desserts and ice cream, this place offers something for everyone
I decided to go for garlic chicken with rice- the portions were decent size and it was very tasty. For 2 rial, it was worth a visit

title: Amazing Pitaschio Falooda
text:
Our tour guide brought us here. We ordered the prawn Spicy Biriyani and Omani prawn rice dish, and chicken tikka and shated between 4.  The juices all really fresh, I had passion fruit and my sister the pomegranate, they weren't watered down or had added sugar. We asked for no ice. Mum had the pistachio Falooda for desert.
The food was delicious We tried to find a Hud Hud in Muscat but sadly there isn't one...my mum is still going  on about the phenomenal Falooda ü§£üòÅüòÇ

The place is basic but clean, but the food is really delicious at ridiculously cheap prices.

title: Nice place to have a snack
text: Al Hud Hud is a very good restaurant in Al Ghaftain to have a meal or snack. They have very fresh food and the quality is very good. The end offers a large selection of mainly Indian cuisine, though I prefer their grills. It's recommended when you are in Al Ghaftain.

title: Good Turkish restaurant in Nizwa
text: Good place for dine in, nice mix grill, lot of variety, family rooms, reasonable serving. Prices nominal. Taste not up to mark (spices were less).

title: One of the Best resturant in Nizwa
text: Neat and Clean with good ambiance. Free home delivery also available. They serves Arabic,indian,chinese dishes

title: Good selection of Asian dishes
text: Located close to Al Diyar Hotel, Al Ghawas is a great place to have a meal at the end of the day and chill outside. The menu focuses mainly on Indian dishes but they have fast food and Mandi as well. Their soup is also fine though I think the food is much better. The only downside is that they only accept cash, which could be a bit of a hassle these days.

title: Amazing Food and Service
text: We visited first time in Nizwa with family and decided to try Birkat Al Mawz Restaurant in Golden Tulip Nizwa. This is one of the best restaurant in Nizwa, we tried Indian dishes only but Chicken Tikka, Dal Makhani was really tasty and delicious.Basically this restaurant is Multi-cuisine, serving International dishes around the world.  Restaurant Manager was very pro-active and had good knowledge about the surrounding of Nizwa who suggested where to go and what to do in short-period.Service was excellent and environment was relaxing.I will definitely recommend Birkat Al Mawz Restaurant to my friends to try.

title: Good hotel
text: I tried this restaurant last month, food was delicious. Staffs were very friendly and background music was nice. I will definately recoomend this restaurant to my friends.

title: Enjoy dinner with family
text: Enjoyed my dinner in Birkat Al Mawz, food was really tasty specially Tandoori Platter and service was excellent.

title: Delicious Food
text: Food was really delicious, very professional service and special mention about all measures of Covid19 were taken

title: Good food & Service
text: We had a dinner there. The food was very good. The breakfast was a buffet - there was a good choice of dishes.

title: Nice with good food
text: Nice place, helpful staff, lot of food. My group had many choices and there was something for everyone's taste. Combined with the fort and souq, it was perfect experience.

title: Large Servings and Value of Money
text: Always the best from from Arabic, Continental to Asian cuisine. The restaurant is inside Falaj Daris Hotel. You can either dine inside or by the pool. The place is clean and organize with lovely decors. The staff are friendly, helpful, and fast. It is one of the decent restaurant along Firq, Nizwa with great value of money and large servings.

title: Family restaurant
text: Good and nice place to visit with all family members. Food serviced in time and wonderful quality. You can try one visit there for change, worth for the money spent.

title: Nice relaxed setting, good food
text: During our stay in Nizwa, we would have liked to stay at the Falaj Daris Hotel, but found it a little expensive compared to Al Diyar. We did have dinner twice at the restaurant. It is nice to sit outside next to the pool. Food and drinks were great.

title: Disappointment: usual food for twice the usual price
text: Rather disappointing restaurant. The usual dishes - but prices at least twice as high as in Nizwa. Service was friendly and prompt. Lots of bus tours stop here - glad we didn't stay at the hotel!

title: Trap for tourist
text: I popped in this restaurant three but, unfortunately, after three bad experience I have to report some issue. Food is ok, in line with the price. Service is horrible. There are several sleepy and distracted waiters spending their time talking and joking. When they take the order, most of times make mistakes and don't even provide cutlery. Furthermore they always try to overcharge. The management should provide them proper service. Despite the low prices, it's a tourist trap

title: Poor, poorer, the poorest
text:
Service very poor and unfriendly. 
Menu quite comprehensive but only very few meals available. 
The only positive aspect cheap.

title: Good simple meal in the center of Nizwa
text:
We had some good chicken and beef shawarmas. The service was friendly and efficient. 
A mix of local and tourist customers. Nice outdoor seating.

title: Definitely recommended for a local meal
text: Found this little local gem on the lonely planet guide and is definitely worth it. Very local experience, with typical Omanis food. Lots of choices and lots of good food. If you want to have a taste of a local experience you should try this special place!

title: For the local flavour
text: It‚Äôs not really a restaurant but a stand with outside tables, very local atmosphere and cheap. The owners and the food are Indian with some exceptions such as hummus and French fries that don‚Äôt match anything of the rest. The chicken and the pea dahl were tasty.

title: Great dinner and great price
text: There is not that much choice in Nizwa but we found this one to be authentic, clean and to have very good food. The plate with rice and chicken is really good and tasty. Portions are big as well and the prices in the end very cheap.

title: Good Food and Affordable
text: We ate dinner here last September with family. It was our first time here and tried our friends' recommendations from the menu. The restaurant looks so clean. Good food and large servings. Affordable too. I noticed that the waiter who's in-charged in cleaning the other table was also the one serving the food without washing his hands first. That was not good. The restaurant was not busy that time.

title: Very very good
text:
In this restaurant we had one of the best hummus we ever had. 
Rice and prawns were very good and one of the most pleasant was the Mango Juice. 
Service good and nice

title: Die Die Must Try
text: This was the best meal of our entire trip, period. We came to the unassuming place after searching TA for places to eat in Nizwa. The server was really polite and made small talk with us, before recommending us to try the rice with fish, chicken and lamb. The crispy fish was so light and yummy, the lamb was juicy and tender. The chicken was alright. The rice was very fragrant and delicious. We came back another time and ordered the special grilled meat platter. It was simply heavenly, every type of meat on the platter tasted delicious, we ordered a side of the fish from the first day as well. Best place ever, please visit if you're in Nizwa, you will not regret it.

title: Nothing special
text:
Me and my husband had a quick lunch here. We had rice and chicken. It was okay but nothing special. 
It is mostly for the big tourist groups.

title: Nice grilled meat
text: The grilled meat combination was fantastic. It was a good amount of food. I really enjoyed the table top grill continuing to give the bbq flavor. The service was good, but started a bit slow.

title: Crucial, shocking table decoration
text:
I was shocked! We went to the restaurant for lunch. They put small fish in a glass for decoration!! I was so shocked, the fish didn‚Äôt move much and were almost dead.
I immediately approached the waitress and asked if they knew how crucial that is and who puts them in there? She said they die every 2-3 days anyways.. Its so wrong!!!!!

Also the food was just okay. I tried to orders 3 things from the menue and got a ‚Äûsorry we don‚Äôt have‚Äú.

title: Very average
text:
With its central location in the middle of old town Nizwa, Al Aqr seems to be the place where tourists are directed to. The interior is Omani style and they have a really nice roof terrace with views over the Nizwa, so that is a good incentive. It is also where they serve breakfast for Old Town Hotel nearby.
I went for dinner and had two dishes : some chicken mash and a stew with tiny pieces of tough camel meat, with Omani bread. Very average, not very tasty or appealing.

title: Worth a visit
text: The food we ordered was well presented and well prepared. Tasty and reasonably priced. The dining area is kept very clean and overall a very pleasant dining experience.

title: Very delicious Omani food!
text: The most delicious food I had in Oman! Try the traditional Shiwa plate. I had the one with lamb instead of chicken. We also had other non-traditional food that all tasted amazing too! The restaurant is also traditionally designed similar to the homes and forts in Nizwa. I recommend you try this if you're in Nizwa for the day.

title: Trip to the anatara Hotel
text: What a fabulous place this is , just an amazing hotel with a great team of people who have made our stay very warm and memorable,. Imran,  mahesh and nikke made the best Singapore sling outside of Singapore , delightful bar and setting , absolutely magical .

title: Great staff
text:
Amazing staff! Thank you Imran, Priscilla and  Issam.

Great service, food and ambiance.

We came with a baby and they were amazing with the baby and very helpful.

title: Great restaurant
text: Amazing food in a fort like restaurant. Omran who served us has been absolutely amazing in describing and recommending food

title: A wonderful dining experience!
text: We stayed at the Anantara for our honeymoon and dined at the Al Qalaa restaurant on our first night. Wow - it was incredible! Amazing service with lovely staff who made it an extra special evening with honeymoon touches. The food was also next level - some of the best grilled meat we‚Äôve tried. We can‚Äôt wait to come back and would highly recommend this to all - thank you again to all the staff for looking after us so well :)

title: Fine dining experience without complicated dishes
text:
We went here for my boyfriend his birthday. We were warmly welcomed and our table was nicely decorated.

We got offered omani coffee and a nice amuse as a start. We then chose the sharing menu consisting of mezze, mixed grill, safron rice and nice desserts! We even got cake and tea from the house! The food is delicous, and the service is top notch! I‚Äôve never felt more at ease (and as a royalty)! It‚Äôs a fine dining experience without complicated, weird small dishes.

We were doubting if we should go because we werent sure about the menu, however nothing to worry about! The food is very nice and there is always something which is to your liking. Prices are relatively high for oman, but it‚Äôs all worth it if you want to enrich your trip.

Would 100% recommend!

title: Ask for Nelly @ Bella vista JAkhdar
text: Great View and food. Our host Nelly was the icing on the cake.  She made sure our experience was excellent by attending to every request by us with a warm smile and a big heart. God bless her soul my girls loved her.

title: Incredible!
text: Service is top notch. View is insanely beautiful. Went for a drink at Bella Vista, and served by the amazing Andika and Kamal, showcasing how a 5 stars hospitality should be. Would come back any days!

title: Recommend place
text: Amazinggggggggggg Food from Chef Andika and Kamal, the services was quick, the place feel comfy to having dinner and they also live music.

title: Excellent service
text: The view was breathtaking. The food was delicious. The service was excellent! We very much appreciated the kind & friendly waitress Nelly & the waiter Metualy. Highly recommend it & we definitely coming back.

title: Memorable dinner in Bella Vista
text:
We came for a dinner in the beautiful Bella Vista, which already has the well established standard of food and service - but tonight that was elevated by our Waitress Nelly. She made the experience truly memorable and shared her good energy with us, bringing the vibes!
Thanks to the whole team for a great dinner experience! We will be back

title: Great food low prices
text:
I like this Cafeteria 
Nice healthy Food nice menu nice teeth
Best in nizwa 
Very clean place nice people

title: Tasty and good value
text: The small mixed grill came with 4 different types of kebab, a good size for one hungry person or two smaller appetites to share.  Comes with bread and dips.  The cocktail drink (mixed fruits) also excellent.  We got labneh pastries to take away for breakfast - as big as a pizza!

title: Love it!
text: Love the kebab plate and shawarma, tasty with very good price. One of the best Turkish food I have ever had. Service is good too

title: Al masharef
text: nizwa's first restaurant is always worth a try food quality and clean restaurant                            try the fruit juices especially lemon mint and sahawarma are always nice and fresh staff will hep you üëå

text:

title: An exceptional evening
text: An exceptional evening at the chedi. My wife and I enjoyed the truffle special event and it exceeded our expectations from the start. The service team know your name and address you each and every time, they are kind, attentive and brilliant at what they do. The food was exceptional, the truffle carpaccio was exceptional and the lobster was the largest we had ever seen. Couple this with a beautiful setting in the beach and a wonderful stroll back through the grounds‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs a wonderful place. Well done to all the team at The Chedi!

title: The Beach restaurant @ The Chedi
text: Excellent food. Great service and very good wine selection as well as alcoholic and non alcoholic drinks. Desert was fantastic

title: Superb seafood restaurant
text: Superb dining, next to the lapping waters of the Arabian Sea.  Excellent local sea food and very good service.  We enjoyed a delightful meal, with interesting mocktails.

title: Reconsider choosing this restaurant
text: My partner and I were very disappointed with this restaurant. The location is lovely, however, the good experience ends there. The prices are extremely high for the standard of food offered. There are better choices elsewhere.

title: Stunning Dine in
text: I highly recommend dining at The Chedi Muscat for anyone looking to enjoy a top-notch culinary experience in a stunning setting.  I had the pleasure of dining at their renowned restaurant, and it was an experience to remember. From the moment we walked in, we were greeted with warm hospitality and an inviting ambiance that perfectly complements the hotel‚Äôs luxurious atmosphere.

title: Satisfaction Guaranteed
text: We went there to have Iftar at the restaurant.  The Selection and Variants of Dishes were beyond expectation, the ambiance was superb and Ms Sheryl was very accommodating, entertaining and rendered a very good service from the heart to our group and that contributes to a prefect evening of satisfaction

title: Amazing visit
text: Amazing food and amazing service by Millet. She was very accommodating and cheerful hostess. Enjoyed every bite and will definitely visit again. The Restaurant, a must try when you visit the Chedi Muscat.

title: Disappointed birthday lunch
text:
Disappointing Birthday Lunch

Unfortunately, the overall experience fell short of expectations. The food arrived significantly late, the service was slow, and we experienced lapses such as a lack of water refills. Moreover, there were instances where we felt neglected as we were seemingly "ghosted" by the waitstaff.

Celebrating a special occasion should be a joyful experience, but these issues detracted from the celebration. I believe in providing constructive feedback, and I hope you can use this information to enhance the dining experience for future patrons.

I appreciated the call from the manager later on and the director of food . Nevertheless, it was a bit late for such a thing as the staff ensured the experience last for years to come!

title: One of the best Restaurant in muscat
text: It is probably one of the best restaurants in Muscat. The atmosphere is stunning. The food and service were excellent. We went for Iftar, and the place was full, but they still managed to get a table for us, especially thanks to Silar for accommodating us and making our visit memorable. We will definitely come again.

title: An amazing experience during Ramadan in Oman
text: This place continuous to amaze me with a warm welcome and hospitality from the staffs specially Jassem and Mani. Chef Anan is also a star! The iftar experience was excellent and will definitely be back.

title: Delicious food spot
text:
Excellent food spot for North Indian food and chat. Very friendly staff and good service.

Must visit with your family

title: Delicious food spot...
text: Delicious north and south Indian food spot... Good customer service... Friendly staff... I really enjoyed the non- veg as well as chat items... A must go restaurant with family...

title: "Atithi" Restaurant.
text:
The restaurant " Atithi" on Rex Road, Muscat was a great delight.
The tandoor and their biryani was of very good quality, needless to say very delicious and the portion size too was admirable.
The waiters are very polite ( Dinesh & Vishnu) & also Rao.
Their manager Joseph makes you feel very comfortable and homely.
Been there a few times, love to go there. I will recommend this place for a great evening dinner with friends & families to pamper your taste buds with the artistry of the master chef Mangal Singh's delicacies.

title: Really good food! Friendly staff and good atmosphere
text:
The food at Atithi restaurant is very tasty! I've been there a few times now and I've always enjoyed the meal. My personal favourites are the kebabs,  tandoori,  chat corner, dosa's, fried rice and sizzlers! The kebabs and tandoori are the absolute best!!!!

Really friendly staff and good service! Reasonabke price and really good quantity!  Would love to go try more dishes!

title: A perfect place to enjoy a variety of Indian cuisine.
text: Athiti restaurant- an awesome well thought out menu coupled with casual ambience and hospitable staff. A must place to visit.

title: Brunch at Kaia
text: Nice and quiet, right by the beach! Food was good and ABIL was an amazing server, he was very patient. Definitely recommend

title: Best
text: Food is tasty and view sunset is amazingfrom outside table, our waiter Abil is so helpful thanks to him. Ill come here again

title: Amazing!
text: Amazing food and super cool place. The portions are big so the price/quality ratio is actually pretty nice. Highly recommend!

title: Afternoon in Kia
text: The customer service from Abil was amazing. We ordered the french toast bites and it was really good. Highly recommended

text: Had a great experience and Hima had been a wonderful throughout our dinner! Would definitely want to revisit this place!

text:
Hima, is a great host. The service was excellent. Keep it up 
James too was very helpful. Enjoyed the evening 
Overall a great experience

title: Happy place
text: Hima was very nice,,and the bartenders where very amazing the drinks was delicious, music was relaxing and chilled must try

title: Great experience
text: I had my first anniversary dinner in budda bar, service waa amazing by Riyad, very caring and responsible he made sure we were comfortable and happy.

title: Wonderful
text:
We had a wonderful and delicious steaks. This steak and drinks were recommended by the professional waiter name KHIN. She knows the company  produce and treated us with smile, respect and good presence. 

We will back again definitely.

text: Very good food and really one of the best i have been to. But the music was extremely high and the noise from other visitors was unbearable. Had to leave before dessert.

title: A Great Experience

title: Nightmare!
text:
Came here for a romantic final evening in Oman. Booked the day before and we were given a lovely outside table with fabulous views.
Unfortunately Oman were playing Japan in a World Cup Qualifier and the restaurant had been turned into a sports bar with large screen and the Arabic sports commentator doing his thing so loudly we couldn‚Äôt speak to each other (or even the waiter).
The manager apologised and tried to convince us to stay and sit elsewhere but we wanted the views (obviously). We left after enduring the noise for 15 minutes.
Feel they could have warned us when we booked.

title: We have attended football match between West Riffa and Seeb and of course touring the most wonderful places in muscat

Unfortunately , we are not one of them!! 

The food is good but overpriced for the mixed grill and Wifi is unavailable! This is one of the restaurants that you visit only once!! 

FIT

title: avoid
text: crew not trained well and unwelcoming, very empty place has no vibes ,expensive and location far from the city.

title: Is this a real Bagatelle????
text:
Bagatelle has been one of my favourite restaurants in Dubai and was so excited to learn that it will open a brand new venue in Bahrain.
Arrival:
It is located at Royal Saray Resort managed by Accor but in the newer parts of the resort with a separate entrance. The whole area is not completed so it seems deserted and quite sad in a way as it doesn't give the hip vibes when you arrive like other Bagatelles. Also, they offer valet parking but Bagatelle doesn't validate so you need to pay which is something bizarre in the region and never happened in Bagatelle in Dubai.

Ambience:
Bargetell is famous for its hip, vibrant and colourful ambience but here in Bahrain, yes they have tried but the whole thing didn't feel right and didn't give any positive vibes. The venue was just dark and gloomy.

Food Menu: 
We didn't expect the dishes would be inexpensive but quite pricy comparing other restaurants in the kingdom. We tried 2 starters and 2 mains with 3 sides but they were all ok, nothing spectacular or wow and most of the dishes were delivered lukewarm.
The waitress, interestingly, discouraged us not to choose any cold appetisers by saying that nobody likes this section as most of the dishes are raw (?). It was rather shocking as you won't expect this statement will be advised by a waitress who works in this kind of establishment.

Wine List: 
Not a bad selection but extremely expensive.

Cocktail List:
Reasonably priced comparing other offers.
However, the cocktail we ordered was served in a cheap highball glass, totally underwhelming.

Be ready for a hideous napkin dancing by the waiters, waitresses and chefs.
Seriously they should focus on the product and service quality and ambience, rather than this kinda gimmicky entertainment as if we don't have already enough by OPA.

title: Best club in Bahrain
text: Best experience for couples if they love night life, this club is in Royal Saray Resort, & one of the best club in Bahrain. Food, ambience , music, drink all is super good, I went with my husband & we both had great time together last time, must visit soon.

Good energy, and good environment. You have a very solid team and this is what will bring good guests back every day. Well done Bagatelle management!

title: Sunset sessions 5-8pm
text: I was very disappointed when visiting Iris tonight with my husband. We arrived at the venue at 7:50pm and were surprised to see a Sunset menu (happy hour) advertised 5-8pm. We immediately called the waiter over to order a pitcher cocktail at 7:55pm. But were told that last orders for the Sunset menu is 7:50pm. This IS NOT Communicated on the menu and the venue was empty. Beautiful venue, but very obnoxious staff! Will not be going again.

title: Large portion but too pricey and so-so taste
text:
We managed to have a dinner for 27pax on 08 February 2018. When we arrived, there only big signage with the menu but no price shown.

Experience.
The waitress said "no menu book/card". She said all the menu. We wait for 45minutes to get our meals. Suddenly someone from the kitchen yelling... the owner scolding the waitress because not yet prepare for the fried rice. Environment not so good eventhough beach just aside.

Taste and price.
For me the taste just so-so if compare with my previous experience at another restaurant. The price considered as expensive. A plate of prawn mee is RM20 and crab mee is RM35. Normally the price of prawn mee in penang island around RM10-RM15

title: Impromptu Island Visit
text: Arrived around 3pm when the fresh prawns just landed in their kitchen. Have 3 varieties of prawn sizes. Ordered Mee Udang ( with gravy) & Fried Prawns with Tumeric sauce. Given 5 pcs of Large prawns. The Mee Udang gravy lost to other neighbouring stalls as it tasted like Mee Jawa & the prawn broth is normal. The Fried Prawns was cooked perfectly & the flesh was succelent to the last bite. The plus point is definately the ambience, sea breeze & sea view with idle fishermen boat parked nearby which is not commercialised. Cleanliness is not that great if you are particular about cleanliness. Price is very subjective. Parking during peak hours is limited so plan your visit wisely.

title: An excellent Lebanese Restaurant.

The restaurant has nice traditional ambience and the food is classic meze style - so best to choose a handful of dishes and share them as they arrive. Babaganoush is especially good - really smokey!

We would recommend for a relaxing, unfussy lunch.

Some dishes are nice but not so good (3 star). Hygiene level in the restrooms are disgusting and all over flowing. Taking the crown of Worlds No.1 vegetarian Indian restaurant is nowhere near to even a small takeaway restaurant like Thakkar, Aman or desi treat. I guess this restaurant needs to look at their ambience, decor, cleanliness, and much more. If your ordering for falooda please note that it is a fruit salad.

title: Evening in misery
text:
I was going with a group of friends to have a lovely evening at lpm ,but unfortunaely I fell on some stairs that I didnt notice
Unfortunately I was in pain and shock and some staff helped get up but didnt seat me or offer me water even
To make things worse , my friend was telling the receptionist the name on the reservation and im still standing and in pain but she didnt have the courtesy to seat me until she found the reservation so my friend carried my bag for me and sat me at a table until the reservation was sorted out
Im in pain and start asking  staff to get us to a table which they finally did
I talked to the restaurant manager and was upset about the sttitude of the lady towards us and I asked fot an apology and a warning
The funny thing the lady came and apologizec to a lady on the table that didnt witness anything and started talking in French So I askec het to talk in English but she continued talking to the lady in French and told the lady that we were fighting my friend and I which isnt true
Finally she apologized in a sarcastic way
But my evening was ruined and after lousy dinner I went to the Er to get checked on
I dont recommend lpm for the following
Bad food
Bad service
Bad reception
Samiha

title: A wonderful overall experience

We had a family dinner at LPM. This was our first visit to the Riyadh branch. The food was excellent with all dishes perfectly executed and on par with LPM in London, Dubai, Nice and Cannes. 
The service was excellent and the restaurant ambience was warm and casual to complete a perfect dinner experience.
Thanks Ibrahim and your wonderful team. 
We will certainly be regular customers and we look forward to LPM opening in Jeddah, our hometown.

I loved sushi so I enjoyed it (soft shell crab is amazing). We had a good night. Place is cozy, place to have intimate dinner. 

The only thing is its like every 5minutes someone is asking if we still want to order more which is kind of annoying. And most of the client is asking for time before they order so for me leave them for sometime and for sure we will ask if we are ready to make an order and if we want to order more. Otherwise experience is good.

title: Surprisingly Good!
text:
Visited for dinner on weekday night. The service was okay, the staff could have been more attentive given the restaurant was virtually empty.
The salsa with complementary nachos was freshly made with right amount of tang and heat. The Crispy chicken was really well made with airy but crunchy batter. The components of the dish crispy chicken fajita is served separately so that diner can assemble as per their preference.
The margarita grilled chicken was very tender with melt in mouth beans. The tacos dish on the contrast tasted bland. A spicy salsa dip would have help elevate the dish.
Overall, the food quality is good and freshly made.

title: Worst food experience ever.
text:
Very dissatisfied and very disappointed of the food quality. I cannot believe that I paid for this meal. the food has no taste at all ! It was horrible and I couldn‚Äôt eat it. I have never thought that Chilli‚Äôs food quality become this bad.
If I had the chance I would have returned it immediately but unfortunately I took it as a take away. 
I would never come back to this restaurant again.

Note: I went to City Center Branch.

title: Disappointing lunch
text:
We (two families) thought of spending the day out on Qatar National day, and chose this restaurant for lunch after our outdoor activities in and around Khor. This place was chosen because good restaurants in the vicinity were overcrowded and had long waiting times.

We went with much expectations to have some good Mexican flavors; but we were thoroughly disappointed with the food quality, as none of the items we ordered were anywhere close to what we expected.

The food we had was worth only one fourth the amount we paid and regretted for having chosen Chilli's Al Khor Mall. I am not sure if the quality in other branches are any different.

title: Chilli's Alkhor
text: This spot is our go to with my husband. The customer service is top notch and also the food is delicious. It was our first time having the molten cake which was on the house. Also all the staff are very professional Jenny, mohammed, Ramila, Ankith. I would recommend you to visit chili's Alkhor Branch.

title: Good Food
text: Very good and Tasty food, staff friendly the food also we received very hot and taste was amazing me and my friends enjoyed the food

title: üíö What A Sweet Place
text: After a long walk in the humidity of night... its just nice to relax and have a cup of ice cream for refreshment. A very cozy and homey place. Special thanks to Jason and Rica, for accomodating us so well and a very professional staff to their client. Keep it up üëåüèª Gharissa ice cream owned by Ghanim Al Muftah (Ambassador of GoodWill here in Doha) whome I had a chance to meet him and his family personally way back  before in my work area. Such a lovely kid with a kind heart. I do love your pistachio and kitkat ice cream. Will surely come back for sure to try other flavors. All travellers out there try to visit this place, it is surely worth it.‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: A must try in Qatar
text: One of the best ice cream flavors you could try in your life . A pleasant shop assistant. Varied flavors. Popsicles sold too. An amazing story behind the business. My favorite flavors are cotton candy and mixed fruit.

title: Quick stop
text:
We decided to buy something here, so my husband and my friend bought a shake each (chocolate and oreo flavoured) and I had a scoop of nutella flavoured ice cream. We were all very pleased with the service and the flavour of our treats.
This is not a cheap store, but based on the quality of the product, I think it's fine.

title: Diet Ice Cream!!
text: This time wanted to try their Diet Ice creams. So tried their rosewater flavor and Chocolate. Chocolate was better but rose was not less too. Little pricey!!

title: Mukasarat and Kit-Kat Flavors
text: As per recommendations, we have selected the best sellers - Mukasarat and Kit-Kat flavors. For me, the flavors were too sweet. Small portion for a price of qar15.

title: Nice !
text: This restaurant is very nice. When i came there i met the staff and they are very friendly and welcoming us. And about the place is easy to find. And i like the design of this restaurant also the music there bcs make me so relax. Me and my friends order pasta and pizza.  Dont worry about the food because all are good taste and good presentation. Dont doubt about this restaurant,come and try italian food at mercato antico üçï

title: Dinner
text: Best pizza in Doha. Menu has a very good selection and good quality food, servers are very attentive.

title: Cozy placeüíï
text: I love the coziness of the place, especially the music (90s songs). The pizza is so delicious for a reasonable price. It was also brought in our table faster than I expected for a cook to order meal. The staffs are very accomodating. Hope that they will offer set meal for a group (5-6 people).

title: A lovely surprise
text:
I would usually avoid any Italian restaurant on very touristic locations given previous disastrous experience but Mercato Antico is a great surprise ! 
The pizzas were good and we were well received. Don't miss the Calzone which is a fabulously tasty.

title: Great evening at Mercato Antico
text:
It was evening of New year 2021 when we went to Mercato Antico, an Italian Restaurant in Souq Al Wakra.  Kathryn was very nice and accommodating. She explained to us their menu especially the best seller ones.  We ordered roasted potatoes for starter, and for pasta we chose creamy carbonara and fettuccini A‚Äôla Polo. Since my husband did not like white sauce,  Kathryn suggested a mixture of red and white sauces which turned out good.  We also ordered their mercato chilli burger which though not very spicy but was yummy. 
We ate everything, a proof that we had a great evening at Mercato Antico. We will surely return.

title: Not Satisfying
text: First course ordered but not served. More than half of the menu not available. We ordered 4 steaks. Medium were nice and tasty (although the portion seemed poor) but well done was rare and we had to return them. Waiters were very polite though. Overall, given the options, the restaurant wouldn't be my first choice.

title: Friendly service and good beef
text: I went there with my wife on a busy Friday evening. The atmosphere was very pleasant, sitting outside by the boardwalk, and the food good too. Although we were late (and here's a tip, get there around 6 or 7 if you want the full choice) we were accommodated with skewers of chicken and beef. The greek salad was good too. Good place, worth going to again for sure.

text: Excellent place for eating. We the whole family went there for dinner with sea food! I had crispy sea bass. Really enjoying.

title: Great seafood on the sea front
text:
We were in Qatar for our holiday not a transit stop and used this restaurant for lunch most days.
The fish is fresh and cooked to perfection. They use spices if required or alternatively grill plain.  We‚Äôve had the sea bass and Rd snapper and equally enjoyed their succulent prawns and calamari. 
Very friendly welcome and service are assured with efficient timings. 
Not a place to go hungry, great quality fish and excellent service. One we‚Äôd bot( recommend without a doubt.

title: Dinner

text: Ended up going here twice within our stay and both times everything was exceptional. Our server Ayman, who we had both nights, was very knowledgeable and very attentive.  I had veal the first visit and pasta with short rib and bone marrow the second visit. Unreal food. We even got a chance to meet the chef from Italy on our second visit who we gave our warmest thanks too. Definitely a spot to go to when in Lusail.

title: Outstanding place
text:
I have been at Scarpetta several times since opening, and not reviewed yet. Shame on me! This restaurant continuously provides an outstanding experience, in terms of ambience, food and service. Despite quite a heavy staff turnover in the past months, standards have never changed. Julio has been the star of this place for long time, and now Melek is always available to support and take care about her customers.
Restaurant is nicely decorated, terrace is extremely pleasant with good weather, and lounge is a perfect place to enjoy some bites and listen great music, especially on ladies nights.
A special mention to one of the best Negroni in town (but please, always use a big ice cube).
Don‚Äôt miss it!

title: Unpleasant
text:
I took my friend out for a dinner for his birthday, and such an embarrassing moments, coming to our table 2 times to tell us what we need to order more and is not enough, in a pushing way to both of us separately!!
Like the restaurant has to decide how much i have to eat! Even I wanted to try other courses despite what i ordered, I did not do so because of this. What a shame, first time happening to me in Qatar. 
When i booked, i mentioned that is a birthday dinner, and they themselves asked and offered to bring a cake, and said yes that you be wonderful. 
Do you thing there was such a thing there?? Not at all.. I wasn't even bothered to ask myself after all of this. 
So unwelcoming!! Not gonna visit ever again. and food not impressed at all. Go to Mykonos if u want greek tradition. This was just a show off and waste of money for nothing!

title: Manko - Incredible People & an amazing space!
text:
Traveling around for work and to home meant I missed Manko, one of my regular spots, for sometime. This was perhaps my 3rd visit this year, the most recent one being last Friday. As always, its the amazing service & the incredible people which has attracted me to this bar & made it one of my favorites in the city.

The front desk was welcoming as usual, Pathitta and team with their beaming smiles & friendly demeanour. Next, it was a pleasure to be greeted by my favourite bartenders Biki and Cecille. Cecille knew my usual drink & made sure to prepare that 'Old fashioned' to perfection! Kennedy, who is part of the security team & always a delight to talk to, made sure I had a comfortable seat at the counter in the open space of the bar & updated me on the new changes/offers. 

The weather is changing in Doha & I cannot recommend a better place to enjoy drinks on a weekend, with a fantastic view of the beach & the city skyline. In fact, I've always preferred the outside terrace/balcony area the most, at Manko. 

Looking forward for more amazing winter evenings at Manko. 

In a city with so many bars & clubs, a key distinction for any place, in my opinion, is always the service & the people behind it. And in that category, Manko is second to none, for me.

title: Fantastic spot
text:

I couldn‚Äôt want a more amazing host. I wish she could welcome  me everywhere I go! Plus I left my bag by accident and she found me and gave it back to me! Such a great person! Also the drink and service was amazing.

Our waiter was awesome, the staff also worked as a team in bringing and cleaning up our food. The food was fresh and awesome. Then we also had dessert and that was really good as well. Great atmosphere with really nice people. I definitely recommend this place to everyone. We definitely come back.

title: La Mar restaurante
text: LA mar in Intercontinental hotel - Outstanding service and exquisite food. Awesome environment!!! A Must restaurant to visit! Thank you , our waiter was Santiago and Sagar estupendo service!!!!!! The greatest I had in a long time. You made it special for us. Thank you !!

title: Always nice to dine at La Mar
text:
It s a tasty full experience in La Mar. Exploring the menu and discovering new combinations of flavors. Nice wine list from Chile to Australia passing by Italy, France ‚Ä¶.

title: Amazing food and friendly staff
text: Really nice place, amazing food and really kind staff, especially Sanju and Ayanda were really helpful and professional.

title: Outstanding.  Highly recommend.
text: I booked this as a birthday treat.  I was in Qatar for work so I was solo dining.  I was so glad I did.  I had a lovely evening. I didn't tell them it was my birthday as I didn't want a fuss, just a nice meal and a lovely evening.  I got just that!  From the moment I entered, I was warmly greeted.  All staff were super friendly and nice.  Really helpful.  I was served by Farhad and Kate.  They were so nice.  Attentive, yet left me to enjoy my meal.  Farhad was great in helping me choose from the menu.  I ordered a few small dishes including two signature dishes.  This made more sense as a solo diner and gave me the option to try a few different things.  I went with one of the cebiches.  The criollo which comprises the chef‚Äôs fish selection, chicharron calamari, cancha & aji amarillo leche de tigre.  I had the pulpo a la brasa which was grilled octopus with criollo puree, cherry tomatoes with fried garlic and olive aioli.  I also had one empanada (you can choose how many pieces).  To drink I had the chicha morada mocktail.  I could not fault anything.  Beautifully presented.  Each mouthful an explosion of tangy flavours.  Light but tasty.  The octopus melted in your mouth.  The seafood was very fresh.  The cebiche was very refreshing.  The beef empanada added a little spice to the meal.  The mocktail was very nice.  I felt like I was back in Peru.  I loved my birthday meal.  The restaurant is stunning.  Lovely atmosphere.  Hip, sexy and elegant.  I had a lovely table with a view.  A birthday to remember.  Highly recommend!

title: Impressive La Mar Dinner
text:
It was a business meeting dinner with my clients from USA and Ireland who were in town for a site inspection.Chef Frank Ponce prepared a sumptuous set menu for all of us.Compliments to the chef!

Service was also excellent by Ayanda and Sagar who were warm and attentive to us during dinner.

It was also my first time so I am very impressed.

title: One Fine Thai Dining Exeprience
text:
At Benjarong Doha, the dining experience is a delightful blend of Thai tradition and elegance, perfectly captured in the ambiance and the meticulously crafted menu. The staff, particularly Kanjana, Auntima, and Natdangi, were exceptionally attentive, enriching our visit with their knowledge and recommendations. The main courses dazzled, and the pomelo salad was simply divine - a complete artisan dishes including the presentation.  Their dessert suggestion (mango sticky rice and Tubtim Siam Maprow Orn), concluded our meal on a high note, leaving us eagerly anticipating our next visit.

We‚Äôll sure come back to try the other delectable Thai dishes.

title: Love the food, disappointed with food wastage
text: The food and atmosphere were great. My only complaint was the ‚Äúno leftovers takeaway‚Äù policy, which I‚Äôve never experienced in doha before! The food wastage ruined the mood for everyone, unfortunately. The policy should change to explain to the customer that if anyone happens to get sick from their leftovers (due to poor storage or whatever), the restaurant isn‚Äôt liable. Other than that, the food was excellent and we‚Äôre happy with service.

title: Wonderful restaurant, smiling service.

The food is traditional and delicious, it is definitely a top restaurant in Doha.

text:
Last week, we had the pleasure of dining at Benjarong! Huge thanks to Kanjana(Ann)and Siriyakon for their exceptional professionalism and hospitality. Your attention to detail and insightful suggestions on portion sizes made our experience unforgettable! 

The food was nothing short of amazing, but it was your warm service that truly stood out. Thank you for going above and beyond to ensure we had a wonderful time! 
If you‚Äôre looking for great thai food and outstanding service, this is the place to be!

title: Excellent!
text: First of all, the interior was classy, cozy, a bit dim but welcoming. The food; all that we ordered were excellent and sumptuous! Staff service was excellent too, thanks to our sweet and remarkable server Yuniss. Will surely recommend to friends and everyone whenever in Fujairah.

title: Gonu love ü´∂üèª
text: If you‚Äôre searching for seafood delicacies it‚Äôs a must try! All the food we ordered are in big portions and taste delish. Very attentive staff, nice view plus the sound of the ocean is superb. Super cozy place, very attentive and polite staff. Highly recommend!

title: Dinner Date
text: Having a dinner with my girlfriend and my friends celebrating my birthday. The foods are really great. We'll definitely visit here again once we visit again in Fujairah. Our server Jose gave us a great experience.

title: Fantastic !
text: Absolutoly gorgeous setting!Food  excellent . Service also brilliant just 2 hours from dubai so will definitely be back to relax

title: Absolutely amazing place with stunning views
text: Absolutely amazing experience! The staff was very welcoming, professional and attentive, the food was exceptional, the views from the restaurant are unbeatable. Highly recommend this place to anyone! Our toddler absolutely loved it here as well and is looking forward to coming back as well. Special thanks üôèüèº to Mohammed for making our dinner so special.

title: 10/10! Amazing experience
text: We were lucky that the weather played along. Great weather for this time of year, so sitting outside with a personal fan just for us, it was great to literally on the water's edge, waves breaking in our ears and great vibes. It was just a great experience. We ordered their famous fish and chips, and working in food and beverage, I have to say, this was one of the best fish and chips I have had! Honestly just amazing. In total, great experience, service is good, ambiance was good and food was amazing! Well done to team! Will be back for sure!

title: very good for the price

title: Family visit
text: The best place in dubai where you enjoy authentic Indian food.Mixed with rare blend of rare foods.Its a fact that u would really enjoy the ambiance and the hospitality provided by the members of this restaurant.apart from there delicious foods I am quite sure that you would really enjoy the taste of india.

title: Place for Vegetarian  and non-Vegetarian  foods
text: It is good place for  Vegetarian  and non-Vegetarian  foods. We enjoyed our party with mix food. Our business client are very happy to got good food.

title: Clean Cafe Bakery
text: Like to visit Mado Cafe Restaurants whenever we visit a country that has got it's outlet. The variety of sweets, icecreams, juices and some food items is great. The Mado branches are always well kept, maintained and clean. The food is great and staff are excellent. However, I find it to be a bit expensive here.

title: Excellent Breakfast Buffet on Saturdays
text:
Excellent Breakfast Buffet on Saturdays with lots of choices. Authentic turkish food.

Highly recommended. 

Although I don't like the idea of paying Dhs 25 for a bottle of water. This is located in a shopping mall after all and should offer reasonable prices for water. Any local brand water bottle should cost no more than Dhs 5.0 including service charges. However, this place will push down your throat Dhs 25.0 imported water bottle. 

The water will be extra charges not included in the buffet price.

title: Delicious authentic Turkish food
text: Very delicious Turkish food.. especially their kofta flavorful and juicy..all meat dishes are cooked to perfection.. comfy place and comfy food .. friendly staff as well.

title: Nice ambiance and delicious food üç≤
text:

They have open buffet in Dubai, Sharjah and Ajman
The price per person was 79.00Dhs.
I advice you to come and visit it.

Just had drinks and a light lunch so I really can't  say anything about the food, but I saw the food being brought from the hotel, so I'm sure that it's as good as everywhere else in this fantastic hotel. As in other restaurants in the hotel, the service was excellent.

text: This place is no debate! The vibes amazing and chill. Various sushi option given me appetite to try all, and the drinks are incredible. Sat by the bar gives you more hospitality by the bar man Rico. He is very knowledgeable about the restaurant products in courteous way. I believe I don't make a wrong choice to come here on my free day. Thank you Sushi 99

title: Fantastic Brunch experience
text: We have been several times for the Sunday brunch in LPM and always had a great experience. Service is fantastic and professional. Such a nice ambience during day time. Food is just yummy especially the escargots and beef tartar. Simple but tasty cocktails and I love the large bottles of rose wine. Highly recommend this brunch.

title: Wonderful Food
text: Came here whilst on holiday, it's not the easiest restaurant to find  but so glad we did! We did ask for an outside table but unfortunately it was full. However, it's all about the food and that's what we got! The complimentary bread to start with olive oil was delicious. My starter of prawns done in olive oil, lemon juice and basil were one of the best I have ever had....I would go back just for them!!! Keep some bread to soak up the oil! Then the pasta with prawns and squid was perfect. My husband had the cheesecake for dessert which was so creamy and smooth! Would I come back???? Oh yes please!

title: Birthday cake
text: The dinner was great, the restaurant was quite pleasant, the cuisine and wine were highly appreciated... everything was amazing, except  one detail-it was my birthday and we indicated this when booking.My guests ordered desserts after dinner and at the same time the restaurant decided to "congratulate me" - as a result, they brought me one of those desserts that my guest ordered -congratulations were written on his dessert for me.Of course, we thought that the guys made a mistake or forgot about our dessert, and everything was OK until it turned out that it was included in the bill. When we asked if it was quite normal that I was congratulated with my guest's dessert at my own expense, the answer was yes -this is normal) restaurant of top 50-means top service))the answer is no -this is not normal) no one asked you for a gift, but to congratulate me with another person's dessert at my expense, and to make it the norm was superfluousüôåüèªüòÉ

title: LPM Abu Dhabi A French Experience
text:
Experienced the Brunch at LPM Abu Dhabi.
The Tasting Menu of Appetizers was a balanced curated selection of a variety of Appetizers served efficiently to your table and at the right pace. The Main Course and Dessert is also served. 
We were served by Ewen who was friendly and seeved with a passion extraordinaire. The rest of the Service Team were very friendly and stopped to say hello as they were going about their duties. Good Ambiance and an Outdoor section with Al Maryah Island views.
Victoria the Supervisor was very cheerful and kept a watchful eye on the Service execution.
Arthur the Manager on Duty further completed the Guest Experience with his friendly nature and warm goodbye.
Thanks Ewen, Victoria and Arthur you enhance the  LPM Experience. Merci beaucoup.

title: Restaurant experience
text:
The restaurant was crowded.

title: Amazing dinner!
text: I wanted to take a moment to express my sincere gratitude for the exceptional service we received during our recent visit to Zuma Abu Dhabi.Our server, Nasuro(if i am not mistaken in name spelling), went above and beyond to ensure that our dining experience was nothing short of exceptional.It is deffiniteley a reason to come back,not only for amazing food and beverage selection,but for dining experince. title: Great ambiance
text:
Great ambiance and very charming place with great d√©coration

It‚Äôs just in my opinion a little bit expensive

title: Nestled in the vibrant
text: Zuma Abu Dhabi is more than just a restaurant; it's a destination in its own right, where food, service, and ambiance come together to create an experience that is nothing short of extraordinary. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or simply looking for a memorable dining experience, Zuma is sure to leave a lasting impression.

title: Another Zuma that does not care for its reviews
text:
Properties that do not follow their reviews should be rated on their lack of interest to customer reviews. In this case it would be zero.  

Another good Zuma, not as well laid out as some of those in Europe, but the service and quality of the food is just as good.  

Bar area wise, some excellent options available and great staff.  Seating area, great, again good menu options, some tasty food and the service to a high level.  

Shame they are ignorant to their reviews.

title: Sublime Experience
text: Zuma offers a sublime dining experience. The ambience is sophisticated and inviting, complemented by stunning decor that exudes elegance. The food is exceptional, with the lamb chops and black cod standing out as particularly exquisite. Every visit is a culinary delight. Highly recommended!

title: Dubaiiiiiiiiii
text:
Amazing place 
Really beautiful decoration 
The staff is very gentle 
They make amazing cocktails, especially krisna! He knows what you want even if you are not sure what do you prefer, he has a recommendation and an idea for everyone 
The food is delicious 
Also the music is a combination of house and Greek songs which have a nice balance 
The shows with the traditional Greek dances are so fun

title: Memorable experience
text: Amazing experience, great food , attentive service . Special thanks to Dorian and Sabrina who were really helpful with recommendations. We had a great time eating and dancing .

title: Ignore the reviews, this place was fab!
text: After reading the reviews i was hesitant to book this restaurant however so happy i went. The food was AMAZING, recommend the lamb shoulder with mash. The table side hummus was fab, they had different ingredients you could add depending on what you fancied. Dress code was men to be in trousers however i wasnt aware, luckily they have spare trousers at the check in desk that they can provide so was happy with this. Our server was lovely, polite, and very attentive. Entertainment was great!

title: Overpriced and over hyped
text:
Not a great experience. Found a piece of small plastic in my starters which cut the inside of my cheek. I raised this and a manager was brought over. As opposed to beginning with an apology, i found the tone quite accusatory and was told my greek salad was made with fresh ingredients... Not the 5 star experience ive been used to in dubai the 9 years ive been visiting, nor what would be expected at such an establishment. Honestly my first review I've given less than 4 stars. They offered to give us more starters but we just wanted to move onto the mains. We didn't get the desert we picked for some reason (we had selected one which looked unique) and got a basic chocolate plate with browine pieces on it which was nothing special. Food came timely and was good but service was sub-par as the waiters just stand around and aren't attentive. Nothing was set out for my anniversary either and i had stated this on my booking. 

You get 2 complementary plates and have to purchase more to throw and the focus on the entertainment is on whoever spends the most. 

Overpriced and over hyped, wish I listened to some of the other reviews.

title: Opa is on another level
text:
This was one of the best culinary experiences of my life the food was exceptional and the surroundings beautiful, the staff friendly and the night was special , thank you to the team and you should all be very proud 
Asa Murphy

title: Tresind never disappoints..what a memorable night
text:
This is our 3rd outing at Tresind & 1st at the One & Only Royal Mirage. There is no better place to celebrate a special occasion than this n glad I chose the venue for my better half's birthday dinner.

I begin by thanking Liezel for setting up a beautiful table for us strewn with rose petals. Next to Mangesh, the man who took care of us whole evening & Abhijeet  in catching up with old Tresind memories. 

Coming to food, in starters, I would recommend trying the burramundi fish. The flavours, the taste n portion would want you asking for more. Even a non fish person like self was hooked. For the main course, we opted for the gold old bengali special of Kosha Mangsho( mutton) along with Peas Kachori. Reminded us of our mom's special. The meal starts with a palette of pani puri, papads & assorted fries & small paratha with buttered. Between meals, palette cleansers are served with lemon & beetroot sorbets. Kind gesture from the team in the form of daulat ka chaat as desserts & birthday treat on
 the house. What a memorable culinary night it was!

title: Must go place
text: What a great culinary experience! Awesome unique food and excellent service. Thank you Sachin for the quality of the service

title: Exceptional and meticulously choreographed dining experience
text:
Exceptional dining experience. Dining at Tresind Studio is like having a front row seat to a spectacular show, where you are transported across India in a magical and meticulously choreographed 3 hour dining experience. 

The presentation and taste of the food is innovative, the explanation of each dish is creative and visually on point, and the service is precise yet humble. 

It‚Äôs a pure delight for all five senses of taste, sight, sound, smell and touch. Unlike some other Michelin starred restaurants where it‚Äôs unclear how they got the award, these 2 Michelin stars and position in the Top Fifty Restaurants is absolutely 100% deserved. This restaurant should be a must for anyone visiting Dubai.

title: Culinary experience.
text:
A culinary experience that is very well choreographed.

We had previously enjoyed dining at the old Nina restaurant in the Arabian Court, so was disappointed to find out that it had closed and replaced with Tresind.  The disappointment was unfounded.

As we were on half board, any meal attracted a 25% discount.

The food was delicious and plentiful.  Part of the experience is live cooking at the table and inbetween courses and the journey, there was story telling with additions, such as sorbet to cleanse the pallet and a quirky candy floss tree to end the experience.

We would highly recommend.

title: Excellent.
text:
Would like to share an amazing experience of today‚Äôs business lunch. 
Staff, atmosphere and the lunch were perfect. 
The taste was exquisite‚Ä¶we were in for a treat. I will definitely return, everyone should try this place. 
Thank you for your time and delicious meal.

title: Very very tastefully food here. We have a amazing food + shisha, burj khalifa view . Waiters are super friendly. Highly

The atmosphere is not inviting and it's loud like in a canteen. First time and last time for sure! There are much better places in Dubai!

title: Worst place ever been
text: All about push you to spend more and more nothing else , this place service and food even not average disgusting .The worst place I have ever been in dubai extremely not for recommendation. üëéüèª

title: Rats and Ants
text:
RATS / ANTS 
We just left here. Both myself and my sister are covered in bites on our backs from the sunbeds. The couple in front of us were also getting bites from their sunbeds. None of the managers or staff cared. They all said it‚Äôs normal. We went to leave and passed by the very front of the restaurant where there was a dying rat with birds eating it. Again the restaurant manager said this is totally normal and not avoidable. Avoid this place.

title: Service with an arrogance
text:
Nammos has poor customer service, it hot, AC doesn't work, roof leaks and the service team is arrogant and very unhelpful. 

The waiter miss behaved when we complained about the AC and the roof leakage.

The manager came and he wasn't really helpful

Actually they think they are giving you a favor by letting you eat at Nammos.

One goes out with friends to have a good time and than Nammos happens!

title: Okay
text: Nammos Dubai has a stunning location and fantastic drinks, but the service needs improvement. The staff lacked warmth and attentiveness, making the experience feel less special. The food was fine, but better guest service is essential.

title: Horrible and poor service
text:
I visited Namos Dubai on Monday, August 26th, arriving around 10 PM with a table reserved under my name, Jane. Unfortunately, it turned out to be a very disappointing experience.

The atmosphere was far from enjoyable, with the music being uncomfortably loud, making it difficult to have a conversation. But what made the night truly unbearable was the service. Throughout our meal, no less than eight different staff members repeatedly approached our table, asking if we wanted dessert‚Äîeven after we had clearly declined multiple times. Worse yet, they kept trying to take our plates while we were still eating. This happened over seven times, with us having to insist repeatedly that we were not finished.

Despite being told we had two hours for our table, the staff continuously tried to rush us, making us feel unwelcome. To top it all off, they brought us the check without us asking for it, well before our two hours were up, and while the restaurant was still open. This felt like they were trying to push us out, which was extremely disrespectful and unprofessional.

This was supposed to be an enjoyable evening, but it was ruined by the poor service and lack of consideration from the staff. I insisted on going to Namos, but I regret it deeply. My friend was also very upset by the way we were treated. I would like to speak with the manager to discuss this further.

title: Delicious Burgers
text: Nice range of burgers- freshly prepared.  Quick service and reasonable price.  Would be great if they added milkshakes.

title: A short weekend family break.
text: Best place to get burgers if you are in Buraimi. Extremely delicious. Try their ice creams as well. Mango and Watermelon ice creams  are so lovely. Great and prompt staff.

title: Steak Sandwiches
text: Freshly prepared steak sandwiches.  There are not a lot of choices on the menu.  The restaurant does offer something different to most of the other establishments on Sohar Road.  Worth a try.

title: Nice Shawarma and Juice
text: There are a lot of choices for Shawarma and Juices, this is definitely one of the better ones.  Falafel is also delicious.

title: Good Shawarma
text: Offering quick service for take away Shawarma, normal or spicy.  There are better options for juice on Sohar Road.

title: Nothing Special
text: There are a lot of choices for fast food take away Middle Eastern food on Sohar Road - there is nothing that sets this one apart.  Does have an outside seating area.

title: Average amongst many options
text: Benefits from any outdoor seating that is not on the main road.  Average range of cheap eats available for take away.

title: Average amongst many options
text: Benefits from any outdoor seating that is not on the main road.  Average range of cheap eats available for take away.  Recommend wraps

title: Great Afghani Food
text: Great range of Afghani dishes served with lovely fresh bread.  Clean restaurant with a friendly atmosphere.

title: Popular Restaurant
text: Large portions  - nicely prepared.  Mixed Grill with hummus was delicious.  Definitely good value for money and worth visiting.

title: Best Place for Lunch or Dinner whilst in Buraimi
text: Great Place to have lunch or dinner. Very clean. Wonderful staff. The choices are plenty. If you like grilled or barbecue meals this is your place. Very reasonable prices and the quality is great. Will always return to have our meals whenever we are in Buraimi.

title: It does not look like something, but the food is great
text: From the outside it doesn't look like the place to have dinner and entering does not make it better. We were guided to a private sitting (on the floor) area and for ordering went to the "kitchen" to choose between two fish and prawns. All fresh. The food was then BBQed and served with salad, hummus and home made break after a vegetable soup as a started. All fresh, all delicious, especially the marinade of the fish. It might lack atmosphere and I would most probably not go there just by myself, but the food is amazing.

title: A MUST try
text: You can go to place almost every night, while staying in Khasab. The biggest menu I've ever seen and the quality of the food does not disappoint. Excellent value for money. A must try on a  visit to Khasab.

title: Good deal, simple and good
text:

Let's notice how soft was the land...Yemeni tasty cooking

title: clean delicious with reasonable price..
text: we ate from this restaurant 2 times in our 5days trip.. its near atana musanda  and the airport. we ordered mixes grills and meat  Kasba üëçüèºüëçüèºüëçüèº

title: Marination is great anf taste perfect
text: I am sri labkan living in dubai.I stayed for 3 days and tried different resturants similar, but yeman resturant is really good. I loved the marination they had. Taste is very good. Secret is their marination. And they are little cheaper than other places for same dished and they are flexible. I asked mixed of rice but for one dish price. Instead of two half, they actually gave two full. They want to satisfy the people. Highly recomd.

title: Rooftop casual dining with view of the dhow harbor and outstanding mixed grill and tabouleh salad
text:
We had dinner on the first night in Khasab. And our friendly Egyptian server made it a great experience. We were amateurs on the first night and asked if this place took credit cards (found out on second day that Khasab is mostly a cash only economy).

Our hosts did not want payment to be an obstacle and said we can just come in as guests. We of course paid because they accepted UAE Dirhams (which we had because of the stay there).

Tasty Tabouleh salad, lots of freshly made bread (Naan), and sumptous mixed grill. 

I have noticed this in two restaurants: the variety and how they grill is some of the best I have experienced. Its as if Khasab is the center of the world's meat industry.  The amount, variety, and how its cooked is unparalleled and the price point, I just don't understand since most of this stuff is important.

You have to watch out for the large quantities: when the grill says for '5', its actually for 8. I could not believe the variety of food, the taste, and the price.

title: Delicious Turkish cuisine, amazing grilled meats, friendly staff & nice rooftop dining
text: We ate here two consecutive nights while staying in Khasab. The food was excellent and very well priced. We tried the mixed appetiser platter, the mixed grill, the shish taouk and the lamb chops. The kids had Turkish pide bread and pizzas as well. The mixed grill and the lamb chops were our favourites, but it was all great. The fresh juices were also very good - we tried the apple, watermelon, lemon mint and mango juices. If you‚Äôre in Khasab or staying around the corner at the Atana Musandam Resort, then I recommend trying this restaurant. There‚Äôs also an option to eat up on the rooftop which is really nice once the sun goes down.

title: Simple and good food
text: We had dinner here one night, trying to find some alternatives to the poor quality buffet offered by our hotel. The food was delicious, we had some mezze and some grilled meat. The bread is definitely the best part. Finally, the owner was an extremely nice and welcoming person and he offered us some turkish coffee and tea to conclude our dinner.

title: Be careful when ordering, only eat what you have ordered.
text:
The owner decided that we were going to eat a fish menu, we hadn‚Äôt agreed and asked for a menu to order from. 
The waitress took our order and shortly after started arriving with lots of dishes that we hadn‚Äôt ordered. When we sent some fish dishes back (I don‚Äôt eat fish) the owner returned to our table with the dishes and argued in front of other diners. Not the behaviour we were expecting especially as we hadn‚Äôt ordered what he was trying to force on us. He called my husband names and it was a very embarrassing experience, we have never experienced anything so bad in any other restaurant ever!

title: Good food in Khasab.
text:
Been to this great little restaurant 
 twice now. Good food, wonderful friendly service and good choices their fresh juices are to die for especially the mint and lemon. Authentic food and one can sit outside we would highly recommended it.

title: Bad experience
text: I was very surprised to see 4.5 stars for this restaurant. The preparation of food took 45 min. The chicken was not cooked enough. The noodles taste horrible

title: High price

text: Really good curries and breads.   Very reasonable prices.  Charming staff.   I cannot recommend this place highly enough.  You can eat outside in the square

title: Try the Omani dishes!
text:
Just finished a delightful lunch! The menu is quite varied with something for every taste, but we (wisely!) decided to sample from the Omani cuisine page (see my note below about menu layout) and were not disappointed! We ordered three scrumptious dishes to share at our table - Bamiya bil Laham (lamb and okra stew), Saloonat Seafood (simmered in coconut milk/tomato/garlic), Muqalai Lamb (simmered in local spices) and makbus rice (included with first two dishes). If you prefer other international cuisines, they serve those as well.  The restaurant sits with panoramic windows to the sea so you can enjoy beautiful views of the Arabian Gulf and Strait of Hormuz. 

A previous reviewer erroneously criticized the menu layout as being backwards. Oman is of course an Arab country and Arabic is read right to left, with books, menus being oriented opposite as well to western language publications. The menu is in both Arabic and English though the rightly layout follows that of the native language. Just a reminder for travelers that the local perspective should be considered when judging such issues.

title: Ceaser salad
text:
I ordered a Ceasers salad for dinner on 16th Dec and was shocked at what was served to me.
For the first time, I was served a salad with a chunk of iceberg lettuce topped with Ceasers dressing, a small skewer of chicken like a satay, poached egg and an apology to croutons!!
The chef agreed to the abnormal preparation. Therefore, I hope this is not served to any guests in the future.

title: great food

we ate 7 times at restaurant, the food was great , the staff was very good in particular Naithan , every time they ask us about the food if its good or not actually they take care of us, at last day we ate a 3 kinds of fish it was very tasty even my little boy like it ,
i would like to thanks the Azerbaijani chef for his kind gesture by visited our table to ask about the taste of the fish,

text:

We ordered Indian food and given that Indian food is common here and kitchen cooks are Indian, you'd imagine it'd be good.

Secondly, on a Friday at 2 pm, there was only one waiter for the whole restaurant. Serving at least 5 tables and 20 people.

At the prices charged, the claim of 5 star, a lot more is expected.

title: Vegetarian friendly and excellent service
