text: We visited twice, first on the afternoon for a sundae each - which were excellent and a reasonable price. We returned two days later on my wife‚Äôs birthday. I had the chicken skewers and my wife had the katsu curry. Both were excellent. We were extremely tempted by the desserts! I had cheesecake and my wife had carrot cake. Both were delicious. A special thank you to James and the rest of the staff for a lovely evening!

title: Good burgers
text: Had a delicious chicken burger. Very filling. The chips were also good! A perfect meal we weren‚Äôt disappointed

title: Perfect meal
text: Great view and food. You can take a walk near the location upto the atlantis the palm on a metro which is very good.

title: Really worth a visit!
text: We hadn‚Äôt booked anywhere and this place seemed quiet and had a nice outdoor seating area, it was around 7.30/8pm, we decided to try it for dinner, the waiters were absolutely fantastic, very attentive, made sure our food was ok upon coming out, bread and humous included, chicken slouvaki was absolutely love (I just personally wouldn‚Äôt have cress it in, thought that was a bit odd) but all in all was a lovely experience and affordable, nice to get away from the craziness of Dubai as well even though it‚Äôs in the mall. Great work keep it up!

title: The place to go on the palm
text:
My family and I came for a walk around Nakheel Mall to find a restaurant and decided on The Lighthouse. What a find! Absolutely amazing food, with a great range for everyone, for a brilliant price. Not only were the staff the kindest they were also extremely welcoming. A lovely outdoor seating area with great atmosphere! 

The special menu (150AED) provided us with eight courses! Paid for by 2 people but more than enough for the four of us to eat! (Taking our pizza home with us!) 

Would recommend to everyone. Make sure you visit when you come to the Palm!!

title: Excellent!
text: Best shakshouka in town for sure, Rommel is an amazing server!  Thank you Rommel for making our experience amazing :)

title: The Lighthouse Family
text:
The restaurant has a fresh friendly vibe. It was quiet for dinner but the outdoor seating is generally popular.

The menu is extensive with many Mediterranean dishes. Some of the meat mains looked expensive.

I thought the ratatouille was one of the best I had. The Lighthouse (beef) burger and Chicken souvlaki were excellent.

The service was was very good. The restaurant has an adjacent room selling cookery books and other merchandise.

We feel this restaurant deserves more attention than it's busier neighbours. We ate at several of these and think food at Lighthouse was the best.

title: The Coffee üêé
text: I had an Avocado toast today in the morning and I was impressed. Really good stuff you‚Äôve got there mate!!! But this review is a special thank you for the Barista who made my coffee. I‚Äôll attach a photo since it made my morning ü•∞Keep doing this and you might change the world innit

Our server Madushanka was amazing and always made sure we got everything we needed.

We highly recommend this restaurant!!!

text: Great service for morning breakfast in business bay. Rovic was so pleasant and friendly! We‚Äôll definitely be back again.

title: My experience
text: Good coffee, and lovely baristas. Dileepa the barista was always there serving good coffee with a smile. 5/5 experience

title: Very very bad
text:
Because we had paid for our dinner at the reception, we were treated very badly. The food was too dry and salty. We ordered a bottle of water, we were drinking and then the waiter came to us really unfriendly and asked us if we want to pay already. The other tables got asked if the food was tasty but we were just getting ignored. The tables left and right from us were getting treated very good. But we? 
Shame of you.
We will never ever come again.

title: Fabulous Friday night out
text: Fabulous food (I had the minute steak, my friends had the tiger prawns and chicken parma - we shared a portion of some of the best chips I've ever had), staff and ambience. The singer, Norby, was awesome and took several of our requests, and had people dancing in the aisles. And the chef himself, Raffy (hope I got that right), came round at the end of the night to make sure we enjoyed the food - how fab is that?!

title: Too pricey for what it is
text: Starter was brought together with the mains (what‚Äôs the point of a starter then?), steak was compressed so overcooked and not so tender. l specifically mentioned it was a special occasion (kid‚Äôs birthday) and nothing was done, disappointing

title: **Disappointing Experience with Chef Rafi at The Black Smith**
text:
I have been residing and living in The First Collection hotel for the past 4 months. I have been a loyal customer of The Black Smith restaurant in the hotel for quite some time, and while most of the staff members are absolutely amazing and always go above and beyond to fulfill my requests, my experience with Chef Rafi has been nothing short of a disaster.

From the moment I made a special request, it was clear that Rafi was completely dismotivated and uninterested in accommodating my needs. His attitude was appalling‚Äîhe seemed down, frustrated, and made me feel like a burden for simply asking for something a little different. Each time I‚Äôve interacted with him, he‚Äôs been dismissive and unprofessional, and it‚Äôs become increasingly clear that he has no passion for his job. His constant complaining and negative demeanor have left me feeling incredibly disappointed.

It‚Äôs unfortunate because the rest of the staff at The Black Smith are wonderful, but my encounters with Rafi have soured my entire experience. His lack of enthusiasm and poor attitude have made me dread visiting the restaurant, and I‚Äôve even started hating the place because of him. It‚Äôs a shame that one person can have such a negative impact, but until something changes, I won‚Äôt be eating or visiting as much often as before.

title: UNIQUE EXPERIENCE
text:
An amazing restaurant. We highly recomend it. Delicous food (starters, main course and dessert). The grilled meat is extremely tender. As for the service,  the friendliness and professionalism of the waitress Sheena and Antonette made it an even more fantastic night. A place to repeat, for sure. Thank you so much.
Suzette Coimbra

title: VIP service
text: We have been serve by your fabulous bartender  Clarice who was friendly and professional.  She looked after us as VIP. First time  at your  establishment I would recommend this place to my friends and colleagues.  Thank you Clarice for your hospitality.

title: Doesn't always let you in according to your mood.
text: The place is great, but they don't always let you in. They let you in depending on your mood. Even though they aren't free, I sit there and spend money.

title: LSB
text: On of the best bars, situated in Dubai. LSB has a variety of drinks and food to choose from. The bunch was absolutely amazing a great! The live band was so entertaining. My friends and I had a blast.

title: waitress
text: christabel is the best and very welcoming thank you so much for your service always üôèüèº the best and always kind and sweet and always giving us the best energy and vibes üôåüèºü•∞

title: Ladies Night
text: Went on a ladies with friends and we really had fun! Food was great and drinks overflowing! Rockstar collins is a must try!

title: Saturday Night Brunch Asia Asia
text:
From the moment I entered Asia Asia I was shown nothing but top tier customer service and felt very welcomed by the staff! The venue is breathe taking with stunning views and beautiful decor throughout. The music is at the perfect level allowing you to enjoy your self as well as socialise with friends. The waiter who served us throughout the night is by far one of the best I have ever known in my life. He was helpful friendly and bubbly. There is an outdoor smoking are attached to the restaurant of which you cannot smell cigarettes inside the venue unlike many places in Dubai. The food is absolutely amazing you will not leave this night brunch hungry! It runs from 8-11 and is very well priced. 

Thankyou so much for a really good night

title: Perfect brunch place
text: We went for the famous dinner brunch ! It‚Äôs the perfect date night and as a group. The vibe is awesome the music was perfect. The food is perfect 4 course meal with unlimited drinks for the duration of the brunch. Their Friday brunch is a favorite of ours too

title: Saturday evening brunch
text: Saturday evening brunch is absolutely amazing. Place was packed, amazing DJ and we loved every single dish. The decor is the same across all branches which is amazing. Will definitely return

title: Asian asian night!
text:
### Review of Asian Night Brunch, Business Bay

The Asian Night Brunch in Business Bay is a feast for the senses! The ambiance is lively and inviting. The buffet offers a fantastic variety of dishes from Japan, Thailand, China, and India, all bursting with flavor. 
A must-visit for food lovers!

title: Amazing
text: Amazing Saturday evening brunch!! The food was so tasty, they even made vegetarian options for me and the cocktails were great too. I love the stylish deco and place, recommend it!!!

title: Superb dinner experience
text: I visited this place first for an iftar expecting a regular buffet setting and mundane Ramadan night but turning the experience into never ending wowing moment from the time I entered the restaurant, the decor, friendly staff, superb food and non-stop live entertainment! 10 across the board!!!

title: Horrible experience dont come during ramadan
text:
I have booked a table at iftar today the reservation took my request and promised me will give me a table next to the stage as we have a celebration plus my parent will be the first time to visit it 
However when i reached the restaurant theg have privided me with the most isolated table no ac no service 
Hany the manager who is supposed to solve the issue was very rude to me very unprofessional was talking to me in the middle of the buffet everyone was was watching while he was screaming and giving me attitude he took the issue in very professional way told me i will prioritise the ppl who paid in advance as if im going to be hosted for free 
There were more than 6 table available he preferred to keep them in case someone showed up but not to me

title: Great theme restaurant
text:
Amazing theme restaurant, great food, great service. Mohamed was amazing!
Thank you Bab Al Shams for a great evening.
Love the food and service!!!

title: It‚Äôs a beautiful restaurant with crookedness in disguise, A nice restaurant with a worst manger to mange it, Mr. Hany,
text: It‚Äôs a beautiful restaurant with crookedness in disguise, this message is to make all Dubai guides and the coordinators and tour managers who usher their groups to the restaurant to make them aware the height of crookedness of the Al Hadheerah management, Please note I was naively tricked into inviting to eat for dinner and then charged the bill to the company account by Mr. Hany manager of Al Hadheerah restaurant, a dinner invoice was sent to the company of 340AED after invitation, note, I had 10 Guests ushered for dinner to the venue on the 25th of April 2024, upon arrival to the desk I mentioned that we have a dinner reservation for 10 Guests and he mentioned (NO) it‚Äôs for 11 Guests, but the payment was done for only 10 Guests and I would be the 11th one I clarified, he mentioned it‚Äôs all taken care off, don‚Äôt worry, enjoy your dinner, these were his words with a wicked smile on his face now I must say after his treatment towards me, I agreed to eat at the restaurant, after I started eating half the way through he decides to call the company owner saying that your staff is also eating and the company must pay for my dinner, he then decides to send a bill of 340AED to the company to pay for my dinner I ate there, this was unbelievably wicked act, please note and make sure not to eat even if the managers of Al Hadheerah invite you as they then later conveniently send the bill/invoice to the company for the payment saying that your staff has joined the dinner once you started to eat, this was one of the worst and the horrible experience I had with Al Hadheerah restaurant manager Mr. Hany, treating me insanely for the fact that I was invited and then being charged that too calling the company owner, never again I will eat in Al Hadheera even if I am invited, please ask your company first whether you are included in the dinner booking or no, if not please pay and eat rather then going through such a horrible humiliation, please be aware as per Al Hadheerah policy even if you bring 500Guests to their venue it does not matter, there‚Äôs no complementary for any one at all, even the host has to pay, every single one must pay, and it‚Äôs totally fine and I personally respect their policy, I just wished that he was transparent with his words, he should have simply said No the 11th person is not included and must pay, I would have understood and not eaten at the restaurant but that was not the case as I have explained in detail, so this is a genuine advise from a tour operator to every guide and coordinators and tour managers, tour leaders who host out there, out of good will, not to get tricked by his vicious invites as now you all know the consequences I had to face and experience. It‚Äôs not about 340AED but it‚Äôs about the transparency of a manager managing a such an elite restaurant in Dubai with no basic ethics and misleading to humiliation to the extent of corporate business level, I was not able to tolerate this nonsense and so I had to post this review to make all the host known the very crookedness of Al Hadheerah management and to bring this awkward and humiliating situation to everyone‚Äôs notice with all due respect.

title: Magical evening
text: Amazing experience and food. Loved the show with the horses and camels - quite emotional. So many Arabic dishes to choose from. Service fantastic from sabri and David. Go hungry ! (Also good value for the price)

title: Highly Recommendable, but is it worth the detour?
text:
We liked the signature fish platter and the ‚Äúto die for‚Äù sizzling desert. Service was, even to European standards, very slow, despite the fact that there were only a handful of customers.
Setting on the Dubai Creek is very charming, noise (loud Arabic live music) from nearby restaurants was annoying, but nothing they can do to solve that, so they can‚Äôt be blamed.
Bit off the beaten track, in the ‚ÄúAl Seef‚Äù neighborhood, a newly constructed Disneyfication of Old Dubai town. Although (I repeat) food, atmosphere and setting are outstanding, I cannot follow the Michelin accolades: they are deserved, but there are plenty more comparable good seafood restaurants in Deira/Dubai. Seems this was just the one the Michelin inspectors visited. Reasonably priced.

title: Seafood craving
text:
We have tried to experience seafood platter but unfortunately the service is taking to long, we have waited of almost one hour for our dishes.
The crew who took our order  didn't understand our order, instead of two seafood plater,the communication is very poor.
The food is nice and tasty, but need to wait for almost one hour.

title: A Seafood Market like no other in Dubai
text: A very nice venue for everyone, the ambiance is excellent with a mix of local culture and flare. An exceptional menu with a fresh collection of Sea Food. Indoor and outdoor as well as privet rooms, as well as a good venue for large groups. A really good team, specially Daniel who is ever ready to serve and helpful. The Barsha Park is an add on to the venue. I could write more, however I will leave the rest for you to explore.

title: Terrible Service
text: The most unwelcoming and terrible service staff experience. Upon reaching the restaurant, we were left attended for a long period of time and had to personally reach out to service staff despite it not being so busy. Our waitress - Janet, is single-handedly one of the most rude and unfriendly employee I've met. When asked a simple question such as "what's your recommendation?" - I was replied with a "You can just check the menu". This is supposed to be a Michelin guide featured restaurant? What a joke. During billing, there was no thank-you's, no appreciation, handed the receipt and just walked away. The tone was all rude, and all the goodness that could have been taken from the sub-par food was taken away. As tourists, we asked if she could help us find a cab, but was replied with another smart comment - "Download the app Careem if you need a taxi". Terrible Attitude. Most unhelpful. Body Language was shut off and rude. Never coming back to this place¬†ever¬†again.

title: Great experience
text: Great place and really excellent service by Niketan! The food was tasty and the restaurant is large with lots of parking easily available outside.

title: Chin Chin
text:
Ever since the pandemic, many restaurants have changed their cutlery style where they give plastic plates / bowls / containers / to go boxes to eat and chin chin is one of the restaurant who does the same
The restaurant has ample of options in their menu which you can order but to be honest the food was not up to the mark.
We ordered Schz noodles and hot and sour soup with spring rolls
The hot and sour soup was served in a disposable container and was served within 2 minutes. Not sure if it was already ready in the kitchen but was surprised with the serice speed.
It didn‚Äôt taste as quiet good as compared to many other restaurants we have tried out. It gave more of an Indian hot and sour flavour rather than an authentic one. Not worth the taste
Next were the spring rolls which were again not very different to any other restaurant. If you going for it, please note it is nothing different than a regular one
Veg Schz Noodles- This dish compared to other two was better in taste. The quanity was lot no doubt in that, but the taste again was not up to the mark. Being a popular chineese restaurant, I was not satisified with the taste over here
The ambience was decent, nothing fancy and staff were also doing their job and not much entertaining 
Parking might be difficult to find in evening near the area so you might have to walk little bit

title: Better not to order delivery
text: Ordered the food online and after 1,5 hours waiting the restaurant marked the food delivered, but food never arrived. In the meantime they said, that it will be delivered between 5-7 minutes. After 2 hours of waiting I just gave up and ended without food.

title: Didn‚Äôt like it
text: Ordered one of those ‚Äúbuild your own wok‚Äù things with home delivery. From the minute I received a msg where they informed me that my food was on its way it took almost 40 min to receive it even though the restaurant was under 10 min walks away. The noodles I got was for 4 persons but the vegetables and the beef I chosed was only as much as for 1/4 of the noodles (see the pictures). The taste was ok but very disappointed to almost get only noodles and not much of ingredients.

title: Scrumptious - Luscious
text: Mouth watering taste. Must try & enjoy the real taste of Chinese food when you are in Dubai. I recommend this to my friends and family.

title: Poor Chinese food and overpriced
text: I ordered take away. 1 mixed fried rice, 2 mixed haka noodles, 1 kung pao chicken and one pepper chicken. Firstly the prices are extremely high for the quality and the quantity they serve, The gravy dishes are 1 centimeter smaller than the rice and noodle dishes. Don't know if anyone has noticed that. The quality of the food was poor. The mixed fried rice was bland and the quantity of chicken and shrimp in the fried rice was small We literally had to search for the chicken and the shrimp in the rice. The noodles too had very little chicken and shrimp and the taste was poor. The chicken pepper gravy was extremely bland and there was 80% gravy and very little chicken. I would not recommend this restaurant to anyone for Chinese food. Firstly for the price and secondly for the quality and quantity.

title: Healthy and super tasty
text: Lovabowls has so many healthy and vegetarian options! One of my favorites is the lime marinated tofu bowl. They give you the option to choose between lettuce and quinoa. Also you can choose from a wide range of toppings and dressings!

title: The worst service eve
text: I order from this restaurant 2 wraps, after 2 hours I started calling them and they said my rider was 5 minutes away from my house, I waited 30 more minutes, call them same answer. After 2 hours 43 minutes, for 2 wraps, they cancel my order. Just  wow congrats really

title: Affordable!
text: This delivery only restaurant is soo healthy, yummy and affordable! They even sell mashed potato bowls with a variety of toppings to choose from!

title: Order with freebies!
text: On one fine day, ordered Pesto-Hummus with beef shawarma for delivery, food bowl came with a free strand of hair. Very classy.

title: Bait Al Mandi Al Barsha Branch
text:
Bait Al Mandi doesn‚Äôt need any approval. This is indeed Dubai‚Äôs the best Mutton Mandi.
But many of you wouldn‚Äôt know that they have awesome BBQ also.  Specially that Mutton Boti . This is one of the best place to enjoy meat either Chicken or Mutton.
Great experience.

title: Mandi Lovers Spot
text:
Bait Al Mandi had an authentic Arabic taste. I visited this place for mandi.
I ordered:
‚úÖChicken Mandi
The taste was really good and the chicken was bbq which had an amazing arabic flavor.

‚úÖSpicy Chicken Mazbi
The chicken was not spicy but overall the taste was good for both chicken and rice.

‚úÖGrilled Hamour Fish Mandi
The fish was well cooked and tasted great but thr quantity was a bit less.

üåüThe service the really good and the atmosphere was vert clean. I was only less happy with the quantity of rice.

üåüThey served Soup as a starter which was really very delicious. They also served tomato sauce, Arabic salad and yogurt.

üåüIf you love Arabic rice, you should try out this restaurant.

title: Run away

text:

title: Food is not expecting the level..need to improve..
text: I order chicken mandi but comperd with other mandi this mandi I didn't like.no flavour in the  rice and chicken also....

title: Be careful when you will order...
text: This first time I show in my life disequlifid staff managing they don't know how to talk with guest. Food is not much testy and fresh . Restaurant was so dirty fly was dancing in food from today I'll stop order from hilal Al barsha

title: Customer feedback - WORST experience ever
text:
Sad to say, such poor service.

From the moment we enter the restaurant no one even approach usand one service guy just standing there and look at us. It was a total self-sevice, I ordered, paid over the counter.

THEN the worst part, one lady came by and suddenly this service guy approached the lady without any hesitance and to my experience in just 5minutes her order was served...while I'm waiting there clueless and unnerved for 20 minutes...sad to say your service is so poor.

Please don't so this ever to your next customer. Treat them EQUAL and more importantly know who came first. 

Have a blessed day.

title: Worst
text: Very bad service. I ordered food from WhatsApp like arounb 9:30 and I follow by calling them landline around 2pm and still the guy who answer my call didn't make it to follow up my order and didn't bring.

title: Good service

title: Food delivery
text: I just want to share my experience about delivery, takes more than one and half hour to deliver the food, if you call or WhatsApp and ask them they will said just wait it‚Äôs on the way but still they did send the Oder I almost wait 1 hour and 35 minutes for my food if you can‚Äôt deliver please stop to deliver,

title: good food
text:
packed as was friday..there is a buffet but we ordered a la carte.
the kebabs and rotis were great.
the biryani was good too.
the curries too spicy for our liking

title: Spicy food!
text:
Ive been at Al Barsha Daily resturant, and relly felt in love with chicken malai boti menu with naan!
The staff was polite, but not so communicative.
Food was fresh, and delicious.

title: Good Indian/ Pak food
text: What I liked the most was the roti, it was huge in size (the typical Arabic size). Food was delivered quick and it was tasty.

title: Amazing food experience. Well done. Indeed You deserve 5 stars. It was worth money spent. Delivered on time. Quality is excellen
text:
Quality of food is unbelievably good. Ordered kebab it just melted in the mouth, chicken and fish with garlic and buttered naan were super tasty.
2 portions are good enough for 3.
I strongly recommend.

title: Awful food presentation & taste
text: We had a terrible experience with the ordered food items. Ordered for 3 persons a variety of items from the grills, main course. However, none of the items were presented with any condiments that typically accompany such dishes. I ordered gola kababs, Nehari, green chillies keema with Roti, Naan & garlic naan. There was no accompanying garnishing such as fried onions, ginger julienne, lemon or cilantro provided despite requesting. We were breaking our fast with this unsatisfactory meal! Not recommended for dining nor ordering!

title: Cheap and tasty
text: The prices at Laffah is cheap and affordable. The restaurant has a variety of Syrian dishes. The shawarma tastes really good and costs 7 DHS.

title: Simply Disgusting
text: I went to the restaurant and i ate there beef burger, which was amazing. The price, the quality - no comment. However, today i ordered and the beef burger was bad and instead to send beef Sharma they sent chicken Sharma full of mayonnaise and no meat.  I feel i want to vomit. I tried to call them back for feedback but the al Barsha branch didnt answer. i will never ever eat from there again

title: Amazing food I have tried( beef burger, chicken burger, Arabic shawarma meal
text: I order food from laffa restaurant my god it‚Äôs super delicious and super nasty.I never ever had a Arabic shawarma like this in my life I really appreciate to laffa restaurant and the phone operator also speak nicely and gently thank you so much and well appreciated and I would love recommend your restaurant to my friends thank you ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏èüôèüôè

title: Great shawarma
text: Good food, friendly staff and very reasonably priced for Dubai. Parking is also right outside which is really handy. Deffo try it

title: Quick stop after the Green Planet
text: This was good for a quick bit after the Green Planet. Food was fine for a fast food stop. You were shaded from the heat which made the snack that much more pleasant.

title: Happy place
text:
Staff was very polite, served food well.
The menu was easy to follow and had a large selection of food.
The restaurant was very well cleaned .

title: Delicious Indian restaurant at Al Barsha, Dubai.
text:
I adore the taste of food here. Perfectly done and served.
Me and my colleagues and customers are used to come here every time we're in Dubai. 
If you find yourself hungry somewhere near Al Barsha 1, please consider trying Indian cuisine here at Jaffer Bhai's
I also like service. Team members are very attentive every time I come.

The only flaw is that they don't serve masala tea. I hope owner would consider adding it to menuüòäüëåüåà

title: New in town!!
text:

The chicken tikka masala and the garlic naan are a must try. 
Highly recommended.

title: Good Biryani
text: This spot serves amazing biryani and is surely mouth watering too... Will definitely recommend this place for their food and fast service

title: Great place to relish Mumbai cuisine
text: Excellent dishes that I fondly remember from Mumbai. Rajesh is an amazing and kind server here. Check out the white nalli gosht on Tuesdays.

title: Best breakfast in town
text:
Amazing food and great service by Dennis. 
He was so sweet and accommodating with all the requests. Loved everything we ordered! Highly recommend this spot for breakfast or lunch

title: Amazing
text:
Amazing food and great service by tonny. He was so sweet and accommodating with all the requests. Loved everything we ordered! Highly recommend this spot for lunch

Date of visit: November 2023

title: Wonderful
text: Wonderful service and helpful from Cecilia.  Great food choice and amazing taste.  I have visited this cafe a few times and it is always a nice and pleasant experience.

title: Superb
text: Best salads. Best view. Best place to go after a scary storm. Ambience is comforting. Thank you ever to Karren our attendants for tonights dinner.

title: Delicious and healthy
text: We were here last night with my pregnant wife to have some delicious and healthy dinner. Karren is very helpful in suggesting what is the best on the menu.

title: Excellent healthy options, reasonably priced!
text: Fantastic food, lots of healthy options and very reasonably priced unlike most other restaurants offering food for health conscious audience. Yummy, healthy, light on the stomach and pocket:) good customer service!

title: Good but not good enough.
text: Ive never been to the actual place but ive ordered here many times as takaway using talabat flatform. I realy like the food but they kept messing with my order several times. Theres a time i found a plastic in my smoothies, then i order my salad and built my own but it came without the protein. Then just now i received my sandwich and i order a wrap because i dont like sourdough bread  as it is messy to eat but still they‚Äôve made a sourdough bread sandwich. I realy like the food here and i wish they are careful how to follow instructions because it realy affects the whole experience.

title: yummy bubble tea at burjuman metro station

title: Service and Food
text:
Greetings!

I would like to commend the staff at Deira City Centre Metro station. I have consistently experienced a welcoming and friendly atmosphere every time I visit this branch and place an order.  

Great food, drinks, and great staff. 

We appreciate Judy Laiza's cheerful service in preparing our order.

title: Great burgers !!!
text:
Great burgers ! With fresh ingredients and amazing sauces ! A must try for sure 

Also I highly recommends their fries and onion rings

title: Cheeseburger sucks!
text: I ordered 2 cheeseburger and how come they gave us a burger without cheese! Be accurate to your customer‚Äôs orders please. I called al muteena branch and they insisted that they gave the right order lol!! Let the karma hits you

title: Great location
text: Ibis hotel it's was a great experience for me..good location near by city center, international airport metro station friendly staff especially house keeping and front office sita,pustaand supervisor jeswin,palan

title: Pharm. Gift
text:
I really enjoyed my stay, Ibis hotels is very beautiful, conducive and affordable. I enjoyed its location being close to city centre, day to day supermarket and the train metro station.
Mary the receptionist was really nice to me and my mum, she really deserves promition, I also like Williams the security who is also nice. They were so nice that I can still remember their names even here in my country.
Suggestion is that a Bible should also be kept in rooms for Christian guests. Thank You.

title: Mrs Chiamaka
text: Ibis hotels is Beautiful, the environment is so nice,my daughter and I enjoys the Vacation experience at Ibis hotels. The staffs are so nice, especially Mary the receptionist and William's the security, they deserve rewards. The proximity to the City centre, metro station and easy access to taxi on my way to Church is really beautiful.

title: Ibis deira
text: Very beautiful hotel , very good staff and the manager Emma she to much good and helpful. Continue like that ü•≥ü§©

title: Thank you Delise of IBIS Deira
text:
Exhausted and tired, I entered into IBIS to be received by her welcoming smile. This smile relieved a long day of travelling. As I had no previous booking,  she helped me in the booking procedures in no time. The hotel is fabulous in every aspect; price, service, cleanliness, location and view. 
IBIS of Deira City Center is the beautiful pearl of Dubai; however your smile makes it more shiny. Thank you DELISE

title: All that glitters
text: If you want to take metro green line, get down at Al Ras Station which is nearer to gold souq rather than gold souq Station.   All shops give better rates if you pay in AED.  Dont draw from ATM, conversion is high at almost 5 percent. Pl buy enough dhs at money exchange then shop.  24ct no VAT but 22ct you can claim VAT refund at airport.  Right now, gold rates are high.  Plan well

title: Awful
text: I did not enjoy this place at all. Deira was not my place and I wouldn‚Äôt recommend it. Congested, vendors hassling you. My advice don‚Äôt bother going.

title: Best place in the world to buy gold.
text:
Lots of nice places to eat different foods.   The gold shops are one beside the other with great prices.   You don't pay must of a premium over the cost of the gold here.   I bought a couple chains.   One 18 kt Versace design I fell in love with as soon as I seen it.   came with a matching bracelet.   Around the corner is a shop with 22 kt and I got a chain there as well just because it was priced so fairly. It's a blast to see all the gold in the windows and the place is very busy and safe.   You could count money on the street without a worry of being robbed.   
I bought a bunch of beautiful clothes here as well.  
The lights at night make the experience even more exciting!
My wife and 4 year old were waiting for me outside and people  from the stores were coming out giving her candies and little gifts.   
This place and the people from all over are amazing!

title: Wrong order bad cuatomer care
text:
We ordered 1 chicken shawarma and 1 beef shawarma.. they send the wrong order .. complained over the phone .. for the past 3 hours .. neither got money refund or food refund .. only after 3 hours offered to bring the chicken shawarma.. so basically they decide what I eat and the time I eat‚Ä¶ bad customer service, completely helpless, the woman over the phone will just talk over me so obviously she wasn‚Äôt able to understand anything at all‚Ä¶
Extremely disappointing.. they made a mistake and they didn‚Äôt wanna reverse it ‚Ä¶ sad..

title: dishonesty and fraud
text: That is the worst experience I meet in my in my life from this restaurant bad restaurant no manor I ordered food form this restaurant in noon app and after 1 hour of waiting my food they cancelled my order from there side and send me message with cancellation and the didn't refund my money back please guys don't go with this restaurant that's my advice to you

title: Fantastic service with friendly staff
text: I stayed at Radisson 5 days and every day I had breakfast at the buffet of Boulvar restaurant. Every day the Service from Anisha a nice girl from Nepal was amazing. She could remember exactly how I wanted my coffee and everything we requested was delivered instantly. All with a sparkling smile from her. Great place and fantastic service

title: Breakfast
text: Breakfast is terrific, the service is outstanding. My waitress was Nasrin and she was so attentive, anything you need she will get it for you. If you eat here make sure you sit in her section. Definitely will be back!

title: A great stay
text: We stay at the hotel for 4 nights. We came with my 3 year old son and my husband. It's really great. The hotel staff is incredibly polite. Especially Shalini and Tanjit in the restaurant were very interested in us. I can easily recommend it:)

title: Nice experience!
text: The interior decoration is tasteful. The food is delicious and the staff are cute and kind. You can feel relaxed. The service of Sriana was high quality.

title: Nasrin the very professional lady
text: The waitress NASRIN was very kind and professional. She's serves with smile and lot of respect and gratitude. She has a nice spirit

title: Low self serve food
text: Not so many comments. Just a mistake for rushing lunch. Food available was cold and looking cooked the day before.

title: Tasty Pakistani Food
text: Nice place for family. Ambience is good and food is tasty. Typical Pakistani taste with decent price that won't pinch your pocket. They also have reasonable buffet option.

title: Worst restaurant of Dubai.
text:
Worst restaurant of Dubai. 
very expensive food with a small portion to eat. the food quality is like dhaba and they charge like authentic food.
must be avoided. the staff is not friendly.

title: Buffet meal
text:
Busy buffet restaurant just after dark during Ramadan, yet the food was fresh and good.
Some fresh starters like Tandoori Chicken and Potato Samosas, add in a very tasty Meat Biryanni and a Lamb Masalla. There were also Chicken options. Finished off with varieties of custard desserts.
Free water and squash drinks were provided. Service was pleasant and helpful. The cost was 49 Dirhams or about ¬£11.

title: Smile üòä
text: It was good food but need to improve the service and the knowledge of the staff in term to up sale more item and smile please

title: Dubai‚Äôs best food, post Souk rest stop not to be missed!
text: A great place to visit after the Souk. We went in for lunch and had a banquet, great food , excellent service and atmosphere.

title: Best Food
text: I have been in Dubai for a week with the family. I was not happy with the food quality. We were told to visit Desi Deira at Meena bazar. Service was first class. Food was the best and prices were reasonable. I will recommend to all those like Pakistani/ Indian food to visit Desi Deira for best food.

title: Desi Deira
text:
Simple indian/pakistani  restaurant.  Food is ok. Lowbudget restaurant. 

Enough choice for vegan and non vegan.

Minuspoint: hygi√´ne  and use lessen oil in the food.

title: A decent Pakistani restaurant in Meena bazar Bur Dubai
text:
A decent Pakistani restraint nestled in the heart of Meena bazar in Bur Dubai area. A good selection from mostly Asian or Pakistani cuisine with indoor seating & family seating on the upper levels, it caters to mostly tourist traffic in that area.
Service is good and food is tasty.

title: Food and service is poor!
text: We went to this restaurant on Rolla Street and the food was not tasty. They brought us kulcha and called it nan! Slow service, not enough waiters to serve customers! We had left over meat ,noodles and the kulcha which we asked them to pack as take away, they took the food and packed it , on arring at our hotel we checked and noticed they have only given us the kulcha and noodles and kept our meat! Should have checked it before leaving the restaurant ! I wonder how they expected us to eat their pathetic dry kulcha without the meat curry!!! Would not recommend this restaurant , it was among the expensive ones on the street. Have eaten at cheaper and better resraurants on the same street!

title: Drinks with friends
text:
We had a good time at Harry‚Äôs bar the live entertainment was something else the belly dancer was so lively 
The service from winfred was very hospitable thanks to osama and medhat 
I will recommend this place to my friends
Best bar in dubai....Bijaya Bartender made nice  drinks for us thank you bijaya...,,,,,,i reccomande to my friends also

title: Thursday night
text: Bartender Bijaya is awesome. He made sexy cocktail all is too good I love the bar..thank you magnum family

title: Enjoy the night
text: Excellent service my all staff Bijaya is doing outstanding... making drinks and giving us nice smile always

title: Loving atmosphere
text: Best bar to have dating lovely environment and best cocktail from Bijaya we love to spend lot of time in the bar nice belly dance as well

title: Memorable evening with family Alhamdulilah üôè
text: Awesome experience with beautiful ambiance out class service, hospitality and delicious food! Nayab is a gem of a person and an asset of Catch 22

title: Fantastic place
text: Great spot! I went here with my son of two and my wife. First of all the food was perfect and you can choose an incredible amount of dishes. Secondly and maybe as important as the food quality my son got a huge car with food, a glass of juice with lights and we could make a family photo with a mirror. Nayab, the waiter, was incredible. He advised us, was very friendly. He even played with our son. We are definitely coming back. Catch 22 is the best!

title: What a catch !
text:
We visited this restaurant several years ago and had it on our revisit list when we returned to the JBR area of Dubai. It didn‚Äôt disappoint.

Food and service here are excellent and we all throughly enjoyed our meal. There‚Äôs a great atmosphere within the restaurant and the staff will give you good guidance to the selection of meals available. 

Definitely give the place a try.

title: Amazing service
text: We have visited the restaurant several times and never did it disappoint, always amazes us! This time Junaid served us and what to say but excellent service and he is a really nice guy!

title: Amazing service
text:
Amazing service  very good food friendly staff
Served by Lok very helpful had 2 children gave amazing service very happy

title: Sunday roast.
text:
Did the Sunday roast, was satisfactory. Perhaps average at best. 
For the price, there are better options, and was charged extra for more gravy.

title: Poor Brunch at the Rixos JBR Dubai
text:
Invited by friends, our group brunch quite frequently.
STK Saturday Brunch, 1pm to 4pm.
Being honest, I couldn‚Äôt wait to leave.
As soon as our driver arrived we left & enjoyed some peace & quiet on the way home.
Two packages for the drinks, pretty much the same except you get Prosecco on the main package. We had the house package.
There were 10 of us, they tried to sit us all on tables meant for 6.
Food, brunch is a bit deceiving, it‚Äôs more of a set menu that you select a main course.
The waiters brought the starters to the table, for 10 of us, sliders were good, Tacos ok‚Ä¶salad was limp lettuce with some sort of dressing, not that appealing.
We had to wait around 30 minutes for our mains.
My fillet steak arrived, looked good, the small pot of pepper sauce (I think it was pepper sauce, but tasteless) was cold.
The fillet steak should have been medium rare, it was more well done.
Waiters had disappeared!
Two small portions of overcooked thick cut fries arrived to be shared between 10, two small bowls of mac & cheese, two bowls of greens beans, there were around 10 in the bowl for sharing.
Just not enough accompaniments.
We had to ask for more.
Problem, they didn‚Äôt turn up!
Service was far too slow, overcooked food, insufficient amount of food.
Desserts‚Ä¶carrot cake, cheesecake & one other‚Ä¶didn‚Äôt look very appetising.
I didn‚Äôt have any, friends did appear to enjoy the carrot cake as they ordered a second helping.
The waiters did follow up on asking if we wanted drinks though‚Ä¶
Entertainment‚Ä¶not to my liking really. Main problem was the noise. It was far too loud, we really couldn‚Äôt hear each other talk. Constantly shouting at each other. Not enjoyable.
I got so frustrated I checked the noise level & recorded levels, at times, over 100Db.
Over an hour later my ears are still ringing.
Not an enjoyable brunch at all.
Now, the last annoying part, most hotels in Dubai have valet parking which ends up free if you are spending moneys at the bar or restaurant.
The Rixos uses the JBR Green Parking‚Ä¶there‚Äôs an extra 100AED to pay for!

title: Stk - love this place
text: I always recommend this bar to everyone! Delicious food, fun, show programs, dancing! Bartenders take into account taste preferences. Reasonable prices, the sea is nearby. What else do you need to be happy?

title: The decline in Dubai brunch food quality continues - with added paid party people!
text:
I last did the STK night brunch about 5 years ago and it was excellent. Sadly, the quality of the food has gone downhill significantly since then. It‚Äôs not really a brunch as you get a bunch of lacklustre starters and desserts foisted on you, with the free will to choose only the main course.

That said, it depends what you want from this as a night out. If you want to party, it‚Äôs phenomenal. If you want to speak to your partner/friends or whatever, then don‚Äôt bother. We noticed a couple of unsuspecting tourists sit down, not be able to hear themselves think and promptly leave before water even arrived‚Ä¶

But for a party brunch, it‚Äôs exactly what you want. There were at least 3 groups of glamorous ladies that were clearly paid to be there and get everyone up and moving. As soon as the dessert spoons went down, the DJ dropped a certain tune and BOOM, up they all got onto the tables and started encouraging everyone to join in. 

It‚Äôs a shame the ‚Äúfun‚Äù is manufactured and it leads me into a deep pit of despair to think that this is what we‚Äôve come to as a society, but‚Ä¶. It WAS fun once they got everyone up and about. 

Fair play, but I won‚Äôt ever be going back

title: Ladies night
text: Amazing music the dj is very good. The crowd is also so lively at the venue . Pretty cool aesthetic and friendly atmosphere.

title: Dinner with family
text: We came to the Trader‚Äôs Vic‚Äôs JBR for family dinner . It was delicious food and drinks. Khalid and Peri were very friendly and very attentive to us. Khalid made an ice tea was what we asked him to make for us. We enjoyed the band , dance and music. Love the place we went in the night. Thank you for the service and hospitality.

title: Excellent service and food
text: Khalida  and carolyne excellent service, very friendly and helpful. The food was absolutely delicious. Would definitely go again. Highly recommend

title: Great drinks and food.
text: Great spot, very nice band, the drinks were great specially symphony made by Swaibu. Every thing on point, the service was exceptional , specially thanks to Swaibu, peri, Kalpana, Aye and the manager Avi. Will surely be back.

title: Great Food, Live Entertainment, and a Special Anniversary Surprise!
text:
We celebrated our 5th anniversary at Trader‚Äôs Vic and loved every moment! 

The live entertainment and relaxing vibe make it perfect for unwinding. The food was amazing, and the staff, especially Kalpana and Kavee, were super helpful in choosing the best dishes. 

They even had a little surprise for our celebration! An exceptional dining experience‚Äîwe‚Äôll definitely be back!

title: Fab food and service
text: Ordered the chow main, tasted amazing and my family ordered the New York steak and really enjoyed it. Excellent customer service.

title: Good place to hang.
text: May is a great and awesome waitress! Come to Mcgettigans if you want a chill vibe. Plus they host trivia Thursday nights if ykuba smartypants!

Good food and good mood!
Very nice place to have a drink with your friends. Service was fast and the crew is very friendly!

title: Best of the Best
text: Mcgettians JBR so nice and cool for outings with fam so nice food, drinks they have very classic cocktails so tasty I don't regret coming to the place so   I recommend anyone who wants to chille to go and enjoy, not forgetting our friendly and trained waiter Tyllabay man you're re a star see you soon your service is üíØ super amazing in amillion big up mcgettians team .

title: Great bar
text: We used this bar at the tea time most days to catch the last couple of hours of happy hour. Lovely clean bar and restaurant with really helpful staff and decent affordable alcohol selection.

text: Food and environment was great. Erica specifically gave amazing service and was friendly throughout the night. Will come again.

text: The combination of delicious food, pleasant atmosphere, and exceptional service, particularly from RUBY, made for a memorable dining experience. I highly recommend this restaurant and will definitely be returning soon.

text: Food was beautiful! Jomar was extremely attentive and gave us lots of information about the meals! Thank you and we will definitely be back üòÉ

text: Great noodles and calamari. Best Singapore noodles we have had in a long while since leaving Malaysia. Ericka very friendly and helpful

title: I ‚ù§ Noodless
text: We had an amazing dinner at this place. The food was excellent, and the staff were exceptional, especially Johnvic and Hicham, who checked in on us regularly to ensure we were having a great time. We look forward to coming back.

title: WORST EXPERIENCE EVER
text:
WORST EXPERIENCE EVER

Yesterday night I ordered from operation falafel media city food at 9:30 pm and it says that at max 10:30 pm I will receive it ! At 10:40pm  the phone of the delivery guy was off and I tried to call him many times and it was always off ! His bike was having an issue and no one informed that he will be late to arrive not even talabat informed me.
At the end I received my food and it was so cold! 
And what I received from talabat 15 aed voucher for only 14 days  very funny ü§£

title: Consistently good
text:
We always go there for some quick lunch in JBR. Their shawarmas are of good quality  - both beef and chicken. Except the one on a plate - ‚Äúopen‚Äù one. 

Falafel is so so , but other things that n the menu is pretty good. The service has always been excellent. 

all in all it is a safe choice with the quality food and service.

title: Amazing Service
text:
We enjoyed our weekend just fine
we had the best view and drinks  and excellent customer service from rod. we will definetly come back

title: UNFORGETTABLE
text: Everything was amazing. Me and my boyfriend we had delicious dinner, shisha and coffees. I really would like to recommend each order we have done with; chicken fajita, chicken crispy burger, spanish latte and peach shisha. Greatfull for the service as well they are so nice and professionalüå∏ Thanks a lot to the Smokey Beach that they gave us chance to have this memorable

title: Disappointed of the staffs attitude
text: Today me and my friend went to Smoke Beach in JBR  When my friend asked how much the bill he said 200 something we really didn‚Äôt remember it was how much that‚Äôs why we gave 300 dirhams. We waited for the change 25mins.  We understood that a Philippine waiter may forgot that‚Äôs why we gave a time for them but after I asked another Philippine guy to get our change he didn‚Äôt get back to us, so we decided to go the cashier and I found there our waiter he didn‚Äôt explain us anything just pretending that he is doing something. After that I asked one Philippine guy with white shirt ( I remember his name but don‚Äôt want to mention his name here) to get our change after that he talked with other guys in his language I didn‚Äôt understand about what they talk after few mins he came and put 4 coins in my friends hand. Really that‚Äôs the way you treat your guests like that. I am so disappointed after that I asked him to bring us close check and I told him everything he does not know how to apologize even. Train your staff well if you don‚Äôt want to loose your regular guest.

title: Great Place to Unwind
text: My partner and I visited Smokey Beach multiple times during our stay in JBR. The Shisha, drinks and food were second to none. A big shout out to The Shisha Manager Mahmoud,  Jobriel the Lady at the front desk and the efforts from all the other staff that often goes unnoticed.

title: mix grills & hommus üíØ
text:
very nice view!
it's so amazing to get a place like miramin Lebanese cuisine. full hands of  food, multiple choice for vegetarian and non specially Mir Amin mix grills!!! the staffs are very professional cooperative and friendly. The host Melaku is the reason to come back üíûüëäüíû

title: Dinner with a friend
text: Lovely food and ambience. Came with a friend from out of town. We has sisha the setting is lovely with a beautiful view of the marina

title: Nice Lebanese food experience
text: After visiting Lebanon I am always looking for Lebanese places to enjoy nice tasty hummus and Lebanese bread.  We have noticed this place after walking on Marina Walk and we were inviting by host Melaku, who took great care of our experience. Professionally served Moroccan mint tea by pouring it from top. Tasty hummus and chicken meat wrapped like tortilla style with garlic spread - so delicious. My partner got lamb meat and that was really smoothly cooked. Prices of drinks and food are on normal Dubai average. I can recommend this place if you are looking for Lebanese food experience.

title: Great food and staff!
text: Visited Miramin two weeks ago and must say I'm very satisfied. Food was delicious (I recommend hummus Beiruti), Manager and staff very nice and helpful. Book a table by the walk so you can enjoy a great view over marina skyscrapers. For two people we paid 188 AED for a dinner (some starters to share plus two mains without alcohol (not served) however, sparkling mineral water cost 20AED per 500ml so here's the tip - take still water which is 2 AED if I remember right ).

title: All around good experience
text:
Great location in Dubai Marina
No alcohol as outdoor restaurants cannot serve it.
Staff very accommodating.
Food not spectacular but it tasted good.  The menu had a good variety of choices
Despite location and Dubai's reputation for high prices,  we found it quite reasonable.

title: Great drinks
text:
I was told the place had good drinks,
And l wasn‚Äôt disappointed at all when l  finally made it there.
Wonderful staff (Carolyn)and food was amazing too..
 Will recommend to others too

title: 5 star üí´ service
text:
The food taste delicious, nice music and above all 5 star üí´ services from carolyn 
Next we planning for a birthday party see u soon.

title: Family Dinner
text: The service is amazing. We went there with my whole family to celebrate my birthday and my uncle.  We really enjoy the food and was more amaze by the service provided by Kareen, Swaibu, Kulusum, Jenice, Chef Imran, Hipun, and kaveendra. Will definitely worth coming back

title: A brunch that is just perfect!
text: This is my type of brunch, highly recommended by a friend - me & my friends had a super fab time - love the interiors and all around displays & decorations, the buffet spread is amazing and well placed across the venue, the selection of dishes is just right without the usual ‚Äòdubai over-the-top‚Äô brunch display, the quality and taste is really good plus the brunch also comes with great variety of beverages to choose from. And not to forget the great & lively South American band and that couple dancing along that makes the brunch experience even more enjoyable. Thanks also to the warm and friendly staff both service and chefs on the buffet are amazing and very helpful.

title: A good restaurant for drinks
text:
We went there with friends for drinks only. 
We had a signature drink " Tikki Pukka Pukka"
It is an amazing Rum based drink.
The restaurant doa not have any veg options but the ambience is very good.
We had a seating outside and enjoyed every moment . The music outside is not loud and can talk easily. Actually went there again to have the drink with family.

title: Best pizza ever period!!
text:
I was roaming around Marina Walk & I came by this Italian theme pizzeria.
I wandered in to have a bite however the only served medium size pizzas.
I decided to have the truffle porcini pizza & my god it was the best pizza of my life!! Never had a pizza half as thin, satisfying & very light feeling, I curiosly had wandered if they sold pizzas by the slice but I had the entire thing would you believe it?!

Unfortunately I cannot recall the 2 pretty asian girls who suggested me this one & looked after me well but hats off to them. Special kudos to the chefs as well!!

Mark my words, I will be coming around, keep it up. Cheers!! 

P.S - Please consider selling pizzas of other sizes & by slices too!

title: Bring it more warm
text: I will love that the pizza comes more hot, however‚Ä¶.best pizza I have tried in Dubai! Thin crust‚Ä¶ fresh ingredients‚Ä¶ they are sooo good!

title: Quick tasty pizza
text: We sat and ordered. We were told it would take about 15 minutes and it was so. Hot and tasty the pizzas were exacty what we wanted. Gazing at the people as well as the water traffic, it was a wonderful experience.

title: A good place to stop over for a pizza
text: The outlet is quite central if one is walking around the marina for a quick bite and really tasty pizza. Overlooking the Marina, one can enjoy the views as well as take a well deserved rest after walking. With seating indoors and outdoors one can choose to enjoy while having a nice hot pizza. Quite a bit of choice to choose from.

title: Good but not great
text: Ambience is good and ordered pizza with ginger juice. Juice was good but pizza disappointed.. was high on salt and pizza base was dry and hard probably application of too much dry flour. Even tomoto sauce was not great on taste.

title: Great quick lunch spot
text: Great spot for a quick bite for lunch. Large portions and a good price for Dubai. We shared a plate of chicken shwarma and chips  Worth a try.

title: Wonderful
text: Food was amazing and great value for money 10 / 10.  This place is a must visit if you are visiting the Dubai Marina area.  Staff were so lovely and friendly especially Ahmad who greeted us with a lovely smile on his face.

title: Like being in Beirut
text:
Amazing selection of mezze . So well presented bursting with flavors 

Amazing service , great attention to detail and so helpful

title: Very Disappointed
text:
Very disappointing service.

So now they charge for everything from small pickle and everything. I remember asking them for pickles which are on the house but they gave me more and charged. I thought that was a misunderstanding and let it go. After we finish our main meals the server Charbel insisted on us ordering desserts. We refused. He said it‚Äôs on the house and is very good. He insisted despite our refusal and got the desert. We all had a big thinking it‚Äôs on the house. They got 2 deserts and charged for both.

It was disappointing because they lied and charged so much extra which I did not expect.

I don‚Äôt think business are good if not done in good faith.

title: Excellent food and service
text: Great food, great service. Charbel helped us with food selection and service was first class. Very attentive staff. Very reasonable prices.

title: Worse restaurant in Dubai

text:

title: Chill w/e spot
text: Great nice chill...spacious..good parking..good food and drinks...some options on happy hour, could have been made happier..bit pricey though..

Tuesday schnitzels specials paired with a happy hour drink make for a nice easing into the week.

title: Great place
text: When staying at the hotel The First Collection Dubai Marina I went almost everyday to The Blacksmith. For a drink standard and sometimes to eat. Wonderful service, drinks advices and very polite people. Especially Rahul, Rose and Paul. My hat off to them! They let u feel very welcome and provide great service! Keep on going guys.

title: A friendly bar
text: Great pub vibe, very attentive staff, very generous portions of a set menu Friday evening brunch. Music a bit too loud for our liking as makes conversation almost impossible. Other than that, we had a great time.

title: Wrong information  provided
text: It was booked through the phone and host informed that there is live entertainment and after we reached she said that there is no live entertainment and was not aware who has informed that to us and we were living far away from location and we got disappointed

title: highs and lows
text:
great location, in Marina, and this is the only reason that can justify the price; I want to be clearer, in the same area there are restaurants much more expensive but I‚Äôm considering this in relation to the other Arab options in town.
good kebbeh, the only dish I really liked, but even a boring curry with shrimps without taste.
unjustified position in tripadvisor‚Äôs rank, you can find better places easily.

title: Ein ganz toller Abend mit feinem Essen und Top-Ausblick
text: We deliberately chose this restaurant again after a visit to Dubai last year. And again we were not disappointed. A rich, varied and tasty menu for 6 people, presented with great attention by the staff. All of this with a great view of the tallest building in the world with its lighting effects and water features. And we had already been able to make the reservation from Germany with a nice email contact. Thank you for the great evening!

title: Super rude manager
text: Bad manager he is very very rude and arrogant he was not welcoming at all.  I will never come back ever. Very overrated food nothing special. The view from the restaurant is the only good thing.

title: So Terrible, Rude Manager Bad experience.
text: I love this restaurant especially the view but I hate manager, the staff is polite and welcoming unlike the manager super rude never come back ever.

title: Great Lebanese food in a prime location
text: A Lebanese restaurant in the heart of the Dubai Marina. The menu is extensive. The food is delicious. We celebrated a birthday. The head waiter is attuned to everything going on. We had a herd of cats to manage and he did a good job. Wine list includes some Lebanese red which is very tasty. Smoking dining room with shisha and whatever else you might like to smoke. Delicious fish options. Calamari in black squid ink sauce is a standout.

title: Second great stay in this outstanding Hotel
text:
Second Visit Still Memorable, Though Some Changes

This was our second visit to Dubai Marina, and it was just as amazing as the first. The staff continued to be exceptional, and the rooms were still great. However, we were a bit spoiled during our initial stay when we were graciously upgraded to a suite.

On this occasion, we found the club room wasn't operational, which was a disappointment. Nevertheless, the hotel compensated by offering complimentary drinks in the bar, a gesture we appreciated.

The biggest downside of our return was the pool situation. It seems the pool area has been franchised out, resulting in loud music and overcrowding with non-residents. This detracted from the tranquil atmosphere we enjoyed during our previous stay, and sadly, it's a reason we wouldn't consider returning.

Overall, while our experience was still positive, the changes to the pool area significantly impacted our enjoyment of the hotel.

title: Very disappointing and not returned my money back
text:
Dubai

text: Even some people give high ratings, it is obvious the comments are over-rated.  We went there for dinner, and find it is not that great. This restaurant's beef noodles have no taste, and seems the beef are not fresh.   Service is also so-so, because the staff do not look at us, when we follow up the orders.  Highly recommend to try other Vietnamese restaurants in the downtown.

title: I did it again
text:
I did it again.
Enjoyed a nice and exceptional evening in Fouquet's Dubai.
When entering the amazing lobby, a warm welcome at the reception.
Even without reservation I got assigned a table with a great view on the Burj Plazza and the tower.
The chief made some nice proposals and the choice was not easy as the menu is a complete list with  attractive and tempting propositions.
I went for a Foie gras, perfectly served which was sheer poetry.
As a main course I tried a very popular dish : a filled pastry with rice. Never had the opportunity to enjoy such a masterpiece including the well prepared rice.

As a great from the kitchen I was offered a Cr√©me Brul√©e which was the famous cherry on the cake.
In summary : great and friendly service, amazing food, unequaled atmosphere and last but not least very social pricing.
Promised : I will be back soon and come again and again with my guests.

title: Staff
text:
Everything was great and the service was so lovely and handsome, specially Anis, Kent, Satria they were ready for every request and I appreciate their fast action & service. 

Highly recommend for your special moments the environment, vibe, staff complete the vibe. 

Thank you Fouquet team for making our night sparkling.

title: An absolute magic moment!!!
text:
From the lavish entrance you can feel the genuine top quality of this amazing place... The codes of the  decor will remind you of the original Fouquet's in Paris in a more cozy atmosphere. The food is exceptional and the service is very efficient and attentive with a special thanks to Ken that was really very kind and responsive.
The dishes were cooked to perfection and absolutely delicious.
Definitely a place to go again and again when you want the best.

title: Business Lunch
text:
I‚Äôve always enjoyed going to Fouquet‚Äôs Cafe, particularly for their croissants üòç and desserts (Tiramisu is heavenly). Then today I decided to try their Business Lunch.

For starters, I had the tuna tartare with guacamole, and for the main course, I had the grilled beef steak with thinly sliced fries and vegetables. The steak was perfectly cooked, juicy, and flavorful, especially with the black pepper sauce.

To end my meal even though I‚Äôm full, I chose the Profiteroles. The hot chocolate sauce, cream, and vanilla ice cream filled choux are such perfect combination.

Thank you Danica for your warm service and smile. The delicious food, cozy atmosphere, and Burj Khalifa view! What more could you ask for?

title: Good rating but issues
text: Personally I think the pizza is good! But.... Try creating an account on their website, its appalling and still had to ring to make sure my order even went through. Pizza's are very small so if you are a big eater and used to the typical standard of Dubai and not Italy then probably best you don't order here. These pizza's are Italian style which suits me, just a shame you cant get real ham based meats here but that is not their fault. Also quite expensive considering what you get. I will be tossing up whether to come back as difficulties online are just not acceptable in this day and age and I cant stand talking to staff that work in restaurants in this country, they are all very simple.

title: Never fails to impress
text:
Whenever i have guests fly into the UAE I always make it a point to take them to the Arabian Teahouse. And they never ever disappoint. My 2 go to locations are the archaeologicalsite and bastakia.

Todays tour of Dubai with tourists friends was even better. Having experienced the worst kind of service in Dubai during our morning leg, the Arabian Teahouse made up for it 100 fold. 

Food as usual was delicious and served in no time. Mainstays for me are the lamb saloona, mix grill, hummus and moutalbal. My visitors are always blown away by how good the food is.

First time back to this branch in 2 years and the renovations was amazing. 

Attentivness of Mohammed our attendant impeccable, even offering a blanket to one of my guests as he immediately picked up she was a liitle cold (in the middle of summer üòÖ but the AC in my opinon was a welcoming solace from the scortching summer heat)

Love the new loyalty app. 

Staff all smiling, the right amount of chatty and accomodating and all super friendly.

title: A Memorable Dining Experience with Great Shisha and Kebabs!
text: An amazing experience at Yara Restaurant in Jumeirah! They serve the best shisha and delicious kebabs I‚Äôve ever had, presented with a special show that fills the place with energy and excitement. The kebabs are incredibly flavorful and juicy, and the ambiance is friendly and welcoming with very kind and professional staff. I highly recommend visiting Yara for a fantastic and memorable evening!
